151a4(1): lus so// slob dpon bud+d+ha gup+tas bsnam par bzhed nas/ lan gcig gzigs pas/ gnod sbyin kha rtsal gyis 'gram du thal lcag gcig brgyab nas brgyal bar gyur to// brgya la sangs pa dang / srin po lta bu'i
151a5(1): tshul du 'dug pas smras pa// gnas khang brgyal bar gyur pa 'di nyid kyi// rgyal po me 'od khyod kyi me khyer ro// gal te khyer na khyod nyid gsod par bya/ zhes smras pas bred cing dngangs nas/ ma ni gong du spyan
151a6(1): gzhan zhig tu drangs/ bu gnyis der lus so// gong du de nyid rnam par 'grel pa la// dgos 'dod gsal tshad don la 'char ba ni// ma bu gsum nas drangs te gtan la phab// phyi nas blo yi zer la bskyod nas
151b1(1): bya bzod na// 'phags thugs 'gal dang 'phral du gnod sbyin mos// bar chad byed phyir blo yi zer la bskyod// la stod mkhas pa mgon po la// nyang stod lce nag bdud rtsis zhus// / @#// rgya gar skad du//
151b2(1): swasti shrI bid+yA ko ki la/ bod skad du/ bkra shis pa'i dpal rig pa'i khu byug/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// dus gsum gyi de
151b3(1): bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi thugs// bcom ldan 'das chen po'i ye shes dang yang mi mnyam pa'i gsang sngags theg pa chen po'i yang theg pa chen po/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
151b4(1): pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid/ gzhi rtsa med pa'i snying po chos thams cad rgyu yod pa dang med pa'i tshig zad pa/ srid pa'i sa bon ma spangs par zad nas dag pa/ kha
151b5(1): dog dang dbyibs dang mtshan ma med par rigs rgyud dang bral ba/ gang gi gnas su ma gyur cing thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa/ ming dang tshig gis rnam par dag cing / rnam pa'i spyod pa thams cad dngas shing
151b6(1): bden pa gnyis mgo mnyam du dril pa/ ye shes snying po che ba thams cad kyi bla/ chos thams cad ni tshul bzhin gnas la/ chos thams cad tshul bzhin du mi gnas pa'i mchog/ gang bsam du med pa'i ngo bo nyid
152a1(1): med pa la/ mi sems par sems shing mdun med par ldan pa/ nang dang nang gi phyi rol med cing mi ldan pa med par tha dad pa/ rdo rje chen po dgyes par kun sdud cing 'dus nas 'grub pa/ bde
152a2(1): ba chen po'i tshul mi brjod par thams cad thams cad dang gnyis su med par gyur pa/ chos kyi sku ni 'du byed kyi chos ma yin pa/ mtshan ma tha dad pa gang yang ma yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang
152a3(1): gzhir gyur pa'i phyir nam mkha' ji lta ba bzhin pas de ni rtag pa bzhin no bya'o// chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ye shes kyi de bzhin nyid de gnyis kyi de bzhin nyid ni gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin
152a4(1): pas/ dbyibs dang kha dog las 'das pa'i chos kyi sku de ni ye shes rnam par dag pa dang / spang bar bya ba gnyis kyi phyir/ lhan cig grub pa'i chos kyi sku ni/ rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o// dus
152a5(1): gsum gyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid dngos po med par ro gcig pa'i phyir dang / theg pa rmad du byung ba dang / rin po che tshad med pa sel ba dag ste/
152a6(1): sangs rgyas thams cad la dgongs pa'o// dpa' bo rtag par dgongs pa yi// mtshan ma thams cad las 'das shing // mtshan mas ma gos bsgor med pas// rnam par mi rtog chos kyi sku// rtag pa'ang ma yin
152b1(1): chad pa'ang min// da ni dbu ma'i lam po che// sku gsum lhun grub de bzhin las// sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa'i// rgyal dang mgon rnams mngon byung gyur// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rdzogs par
152b2(1): longs spyod pa'i sku/ thugs rje chen po de ni/ rtag pa dang mi rtag pa gnyis 'dzin pa'i phyir na/ rtag pa dang mi rtag pa chen po zhes bya ste/ de ni sbyangs pas thob par bstan no// yang dag bstan te mngon par
152b3(1): snang // sangs rgyas rnams dang dgongs pa mthun// gcig la gnyis la spyod phyir gcig/ de ni longs spyod mtshan dang ldan// smon lam ldan pa'i skal chen la// rgyu rkyen 'dus las gsal bar snang // sprul pa'i
152b4(1): sku ni mdzad pa'i don la sprul par mdzad cing / khro ba dang 'dzum pa dang / rgyan can dang / rgyan med par 'phrul pa'i phyir sprul pa'i sku'o// mi rtag rtag pa sbrul ldan zhing // sbyangs pa'i mchog gyur kun gsung
152b5(1): 'gyur// mtshungs par spyod dang ston mang po// theg pa bzhi ni ston par 'gyur// rang bzhin ye shes ting nge 'dzin// dag pa sku gsum pi wang tshul// de gsum rnam par dag pa ni// de bzhin de bzhin de bzhin
152b6(1): phyir// sangs rgyas rnam kun tha mi dad// de phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes chen por rab gsal bas// yang dag dbyings la mnyam sbyar bas// chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyi zhing // mi skye mi 'gag mi
153a1(1): dgongs phyir// de la rtag chad mthar mi chags// ye shes rig pas don rig pas// nyams su blang med rang rig nyid// ye shes rang rig 'di 'dra zhes// rdo rje sems dpas bstan du med// kun
153a2(1): rdzob brjod yod ma rtogs pa// yang dag bden pa nyid du ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// rang bzhin med pas ye nas zhi// gcig pas du ma med par gyur// gcig las mnyam nyid phyogs bral
153a3(1): bas// de dag rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// thams cad de bzhin nyid du bzhag/ rang byung rang zhi mnyam bzhag pas// mtshan ma'i 'gog par lhung mi srid// de ltar don la reg gyur na// ci la gnas shing gang
153a4(1): la chags// gang zhig 'gag cing ci zhig blang // ma spangs lhun grub kun tu bzang // sku gsum ldan pas pho brang mchog/ lhun grub bya yi dbyibs 'dra la// rtsi shing nags tshal sna tshogs ldan// gcan zan ri
153a5(1): dwags sems can rnams// thams cad tha dad bsam gyis mi khyab nas// rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin sogs kyi// bla med gnas sogs las kyi mthong // rtogs nas rang skal ldan pas chos// so sor go ba bsam
153a6(1): mi khyab/ de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po la zhal shin tu 'dzum pas bltas nas// e ma ho rab tu gsang ba'i mchog/ gang las byung nas ci zhig byed// gang du 'gro ba su
153b1(1): la 'tshal// yangs pa chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes ched du gleng ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das chen po dpal kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ rnam dag pa dang mya ngan 'das// chos sku dngos yod rnam dag
153b2(1): nyid// gzhan las ma byung rang la gnas// sna tshogs rang bzhin mi gnyis te// cha shas nyid du spros dang bral// theg pa sna tshogs yin par bshad// mchog gi dam pa snying po ni// lung gi dam pa byang chub
153b3(1): sems// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos ched du gleng pa// so so skye bos mi shes pas// shes pa gsum po ma spangs phyir// sku gsum las ni ring du
153b4(1): 'gyur// sku gsum ye shes che rten 'byung // zin pas rtsol ba'i nad spangs te// lhun gyis gnas pas bzhag pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ rab tu gsang ba'i chos bsam par bya
153b5(1): ba la rab tu gleng ba/ bsam pa bsam par mi bya ste// mi bsam pa'ang mi bsam mo// gang la'ang rnam par mi sems pa// de ni de bzhin mnyam nyid do// rnam mi rtog tu kun 'dus phyir// tshor bar bsgoms na
153b6(1): ci zhig gnas// ji bzhin pa zhes bstan pa nyid// rang gi rig pa tshangs pa yin// bkra shis pa'i rig pa khu byug las dngos po gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
154a1(1): sems dpas mchod pa rnam gnyis mchod de/ phyag btsal te shin tu 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i ngag gis/ bcom ldan 'das chen po bde bar gshegs pa chen po// mtha' dag dbus su blta ba ji
154a2(1): ltar lags/ phyi rol yul la ji ltar 'tshal/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro ba dang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin pa dang / rigs lnga ye shes lngar bstan pa ji ltar lags/ gsang sngags rig sngags zhes bya ba ni gang /
154a3(1): rdo rje theg pa chen po'i sgo nas 'jug pa dang / mdo sde'i sgo nas 'jug pa gnyis sems mnyam par 'jog pa'i dus na tshul ji ltar 'jog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/
154a4(1): mtha' spang dbus rtogs pa la shes yul dbye// 'gro ba'i yid du kun gcig rdo rje sems dpa'i ngang // ye shes dbyings gsal skye med thabs chen gyis// byin brlabs khyad 'phags rgyal ba rigs lngar
154a5(1): snang // don dam gsang ba gsang sngags rgyal po che// rnam grol dag pa rig sngags bla med gsung // 'jug ldog mthar zad bla med lhun grub lam// stong smon mtshan 'dzin lam mchog bde ba sgrub// zhi dang
154a6(1): gnas dang lhag mthong dag dang ni// kun gzhi rnam shes yod pa'i dngos nyid dang // 'jig rten blta ba rnam bzhi 'das pa'i blta// khams gsum las 'das nor bu rin po che// phung po lnga po mi g.yo byang chub
154b1(1): lam// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug phrag dog rgyal// bde ba bde la gnas pa'i bde ba mchog/ rnal 'byor cig char 'jug pa'i lam 'di ni// 'jug par mi rung zhes ni skur 'debs pa// dbang po rtul po ma
154b2(1): rabs tha mal pa// gnas ngan len pa'i bag chags sbyang rung ste// gnyis med don dam kun rdzob bden gnyis gcig/ gnyis su mi blta snying po byang chub nyid// zhi gnas lhag mthong stong pas brgyal bying la
154b3(1): sogs bral// dben pa'i grong dang grong khyer ri sul dang // dgon pa dben pa'i nags gseb dur khrod rnams// brten par byed cing bdag bstod gzhan smod cing // brnyed dang bskur sti dag la gang chags
154b4(1): pa// mkhas pa ma yin shin tu'ang dran pa nyams// chos lnga ldan pa'i byang chub thob par gsungs// skye ba dag la mos pa'i nyon mongs 'di// sems kyi tshul khrims nyams te zhig pa yin// de nas bcom ldan
154b5(1): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la/ rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa/ the tshom gyi sgrib pa dag par bgyi ba'i slad du/ zhu ba'i spobs pa bgyid
154b6(1): pa'o// gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsum// gcig gam 'on te tha dad bstan pa dang // lha yi dkyil 'khor nye bar bsgrub pa'i tshe// las gzhan phra mo brtsams pas bsgrib mi
155a1(1): bsgrib// zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor so sor mchis ma mchis// lha gcig bsgoms pas gzhan dbang 'gyur ram ci// rnal 'byor mi rtog ting 'dzin gsal gyur na// ting 'dzin gzhan la snyoms par
155a2(1): 'jug mi 'jug/ sngags la 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// mdo sde bsgoms nas gtan tshigs bcal na ko/ 'phags pa dag dang mi mnyam skyon ci lags// bsgom du med par gzhag tu rung mi
155a3(1): rung // lung dang slob dpon mkhas pas sems bcos na// sngags kyi 'phro 'du med par don thob bam// dge ba gzhan gyi rnam smin phyi mar 'byung // sngags spyod tshe 'dir 'grub bam ci las 'gyur// nges pa'i
155a4(1): dbang ma thob pa'i slob dpon gyis// gzhan la dbang bskur dbang thob phan mi phan// zhes zhus pas/ ched du gleng pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi goms pa'i mthur ldan na// rang bzhin gzugs brnyan bye brag cung zad
155a5(1): med// thams cad sku gsung thugs su 'od gsal na// stobs ldan gud na med pas bsgrib mi nus// chos sku ro gcig 'gro don byed mnyam ste// mos pa'i blo la so so nyid du gsal// ye shes dbyings su phyag
155a6(1): rgya kun gcig phyir// bde gshegs gcig bsgom rgyal ba kun gyi ngang // ting 'dzin snying po mi rtog goms gyur na// ting 'dzin gzhan phra de la sbyar mi dgos// gcig car 'jug pa goms pa mngon gyur na// tshe
155b1(1): 'dir 'grub pa gdon mi za bar rtogs// ma rig bdag tu bzung nas blta nyes pas// sangs rgyas sems can 'byed pa srid pa'i rtsa// don dam skye med dngos po med bden pas// bsgom du med par 'jog pa
155b2(1): dam pa nyid// yang dag ma nor gdeng chen ldan pas gang // blo yi gting du shin tu ngoms byas nas// btsal mi dgos pa'i nor bu rin po che// dge sdig gnyis kyi 'bras bu so sor smin// theg dman gnyis
155b3(1): ka'i rgyu la bzhugs yod phyir// zhe sdang la sogs ngan song rgyu nyid da lta dag pa'i phyir// tshe 'di'i 'bras bu thob pa de nyid mod// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gsang chen nges pa'i dbang // byin nam bstan nam mthong
155b4(1): bar ma byas na// rdo rje rgyal po yon tan dbang med pas// nor bu rgyal sar bskos pa ji bzhin du// dbang bskur byas pas bdag gzhan brlag par 'gyur// bkra shis pa rig pa'i khu byug las/ mdor bsdus
155b5(1): pa mdo sde'i dgongs pa dang zhus pa'i lan dang bcas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ btsal ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du
155b6(1): brjod pa 'di brjod do// rdo rje'i sems ni gsung bgrod sbyang ba ma lus de dbang bsgyur// rdo rje 'du 'bral med de bde ba la gnas rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje de ni skye dang 'gag pa med de yangs shing zab// de phyir
156a1(1): rdo rje zab mo yangs shing zab pa'i gting ni lta ba rdo rje yin// rdo rje nam mkha' lta bu de ni thams cad skyed pa'i rgyu ste gzhi ma yin pas che// de phyir rdo rje kun byung snying po ma btsal bzhag nas
156a2(1): bsgom// sems kyi ngang nyid kha dog dngos med ji bzhin te// gang nas ma byon phyi rol nang rol gnyis ka min// shes rab tshogs kyi snying rje'i brlan dang ma bral thams cad slengs// log rtog mtshan ma'i 'du
156a3(1): shes thams cad de las 'byung // sbyin pa la sogs pha rol phyin pa bcu yang rang bzhin rdzogs// lam 'dus rim pa sa dang 'jug lta thams cad 'grub pa yin// spang len med par chos 'di sgyu mar gnas pas
156a4(1): na// lus ngag yid gsum yang dag pa nyid ye nas shes pa yin// sangs rgyas chos la gus shing rnyed 'dod dran pa shes rab min// gtong ba tshul khrims chos sems pa la byang chub ring ste gnam sa
156a5(1): bzhin// thams cad kun tu bzang po'i ngang du gcig par shes par bya// mtha' yas rab tu mtha' yas pa yi sems can thams cad kun// rang byung rnam dag sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas
156a6(1): la sogs phyag rgya 'bar ba nyid du don 'di snang bas min// snang srid lhun gyis rdzogs par shes pas thabs kyi thabs// med pa'i rgyu las yod pa'i dngos por 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pa'i dkyil
156b1(1): 'khor la sogs pa yi tshogs// snang yang dngos po med pa'i tshul yin na// de la ji ltar brtags kyang dngos po ci zhig yod// dpe dang tshad ma gtan tshigs rjes su dpag pa yis// ya mtshan rmad kyi chos 'di
156b2(1): rtogs par nus pa ma yin te// rtag par kun rdzob rnam par snang mdzad sku// yid bzhin nor ltar dgos dgu 'byung ba'i gzhi// de bas gsang sngags bdag nyid chen po 'di// dngos grub byin rlabs gtams
156b3(1): pa'i thabs shes can// bsam yas gting dpag dka' ba rgyal po 'dra// khams gsum las 'das byang chub rin po che// stor bas btsal kyang rnyed par ga la 'gyur// thig le chen po kun tu chub gnas
156b4(1): pa'i// thabs dang shes rab rnam ldan ye shes snying po nyid// zla gsang thig le skye 'gag bdag tu rdzogs// skyes chen thugs la rtag tu gsal ba'i sku// thams cad ye sangs rgyas pa'i rdzogs chen 'di// ma
156b5(1): bkag ci bder gnas pa'i thabs po che// mi bsgrib gsal bar gnas pas pad+ma can// gnyis med thig ler 'dus shing brjod las 'das/ bkra shis pa rig pa'i khu byug gi rgyud las/ thabs dang shes rab
156b6(1): gnyis su med pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos gsang ba khyad par du bstan pa ched du brjod de/ phung po lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i tshe// dkar
157a1(1): mthing ser po le brgan ljang gu'i mdog/ gsal ba sra ba mnyen pa dro ba dang // gnyis med 'khril ba gzhon tshul chags par bzhugs// mthong thos bsnams dang myangs pa dag pa'i
157a2(1): dbang // mthong bya mnyan bya bsnam bya myang bya rnams// mthong byed zos byed snom byed myong byed dang // 'das dang da ltar byung dang ma byon tshogs// gnyis med 'khril ba rgyal ba yab yum tshul// mthar byed reg
157a3(1): dang reg byed reg shes dang // rtag chad bdag dang mtshan mar ma yin rnams// gdod nas dag pa'i yab yum dkyil 'khor rdzogs// yang dag bden pa'i 'bras bu kun rdzob rgya// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten
157a4(1): 'das pa'i zhing // dkyil 'khor skrod yul dkyil 'khor gsum du 'dus// 'bras bu smin pa'i rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i mthu// rdo rje sems dpa' klong chen lam gyi mchog/ gdod nas mi skye mi 'chi dgongs pa
157a5(1): dag/ kun tu khyab gdal ye shes chen po'i sbubs// snying rje'i rtsal chen brtser med kun sangs rgyas// bde chen bdag rnams mtshan ma rnam par spang // che ba'i yang che mtsho ltar zab pa'i phyir// ji bzhin mi
157a6(1): bskyod bya med rnam par grol// rang byung ye shes 'byung ba 'byung ba'i mchog/ gzhan nas ma yin 'gro ba kun la gnas// thun mong bde ba byang chub rnyed dka' ba// zhing dang spyod yul yongs su 'phrul pa
157b1(1): min// snang med nam mkha' lta bur rab 'byor bas// de la mi btsal de bzhin rnam par gzhag/ mchog gi mchog tu gyur pa'i theg pa'i mchog/ thig le gcig tu zlum kyang brjod du med// de nas bcom ldan
157b2(1): 'das bde ba chen po'i snying po 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rigs lnga sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bton to// bton nas ye shes chen po 'od 'bar ba'i sku lngar gyur
157b3(1): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po mnyes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ btsun mo'i tshogs 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las/ d+hA dI shwa ri/ dwe Sha ra ti/ mo
157b4(1): ha ra ti/ rA ga ra ti/ badz+ra ra ti rnams phyung nas mnyes pa chen po'i btsun mo lngar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ta kr-id bzhi sku
157b5(1): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de phyung ma thag tu sgo ba 'bar ba bzhir gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de nyid mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla med ye nas khyab pas mi 'dzin gtor// thig le
157b6(1): rtsal thag chad pas las rnams rdzogs// mi rtog mnyam las 'das pas bgegs rnams zhi// mnyam rdzogs brjod du med pa snying po'i gtso// mkha' ltar mi g.yo rang bzhin btab pa'i rgya// cis kyang khyod nyid
158a1(1): ye shes gsal ba'i ngang // mi 'dor tshig bral lhun rdzogs mnyam ma nyid// dkyil 'khor chen por rang bzhin gnas pa'i rgya// thams cad ye nas dag pa'i lhag ma med// mi 'gyur snying por gyur
158a2(1): pas drang po'i mchog/ mtha' las mkha' bzhin gnas pas mi mnyam med// btsal ba med pas gzhan la ltos ma yin// lhun gnas bde chen mtshungs pa'i rgyal po 'di// ming tsam tshig tu 'di zhes btags
158a3(1): nas ni// bstan du rdo rje sems dpa' ngas ma bstan// thabs dang shes rab rnam pa ldan byas nas// snying rje sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'dzin 'dong gang // de la 'dzin pa yod phyir skyon yin te// snying po'i rang bzhin
158a4(1): gcig tu ma nges pas// ji ltar 'dod pa dpung mi dgos par snang // snang stong phyag rgyar rtsol bas bde 'dod pa// bla med theg pa'i sgrib shing skyon can yin// yig 'brus bskyed pa'i phyag rgya bzhi ldan sku// cha
158a5(1): lugs gsal bar chu zla bzhin snang ste// snang stong ngo bo nyid du bsgoms gyur kyang // bsgom pa nyid kyis spre'u'i spyod yul 'dra// dkyil 'khor chen po rnam gsum 'od 'bar bas// dbang po mngon du gsal
158a6(1): bar gyur na yang // theg mchog 'di la reg pa yod ma yin// bkra shis pa rig pa'i khu byug gi rgyud las/ ma hA yo ga rdo rje theg pa chen po'i gol sa yin par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas
158b1(1): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos// ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// tshogs sbyor bsgom pa mthong ba mthar phyin lam// tshad med bzhis ni kun kyang skye bar nus pa yin// sku gsung thugs las
158b2(1): bral bas tshogs rdzogs che ba'i mchog/ lam med pas na lam la mi btsal bde ba'i lhun// rgyu 'bras mi phyed 'dus pa'i rdo rje yin// ma skyes ye nas gnas pas 'jig pa med// gdod nas byang chub snying po'i
158b3(1): rang bzhin la// btsal ba'i bsam pa yod pas don mi rnyed// kun tu khyab pas rtag pa byams pa'i sku// phyag rgya'i 'byung 'jug med kyang nyams pa med// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sems kyi 'byung 'jug
158b4(1): yin// chos sku ye khyab kun khyab rnam par rol// bskyod med nam mkha'i dbyings ltar mnyam par gnas// khyad par cir yang mtshungs pa byams pa'i mchog/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
158b5(1): la// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// spang du med pa'i lam lnga po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thar pa'i mdzod// spyod par bya ba rnam thar lnga nyid kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sku yi
158b6(1): gsos// 'dod yon rnam lnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan// sangs rgyas dang ni slob dpon phyag rgya sngags// lcam dral tshul du blta rnams yan lag bsam// 'di yang byang chub thob pa'i lam po che// ye shes kyi
159a1(1): ni tshogs chen bsgom pa yin// lam gyi mchog ste nye lam nye rdzogs lam// bsod nas tshogs kyang mi sbyor mi rung min// ye shes dam pa thob pa'i tshogs kyang rung // bsam gtan rab tu gnas
159a2(1): pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang mtshungs// mang du thos pas byang chub la reg kyang // mi dmigs mi gnas tshad med stong pa nyid// pha rol phyin drug lam gyi gter du gsungs// gdod 'jug rim gyis sbyong ba don thob
159a3(1): ldan// dge bcu spyad med chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan// bkra shis pa rig pa'i khu byug gi rgyud las/ byang chub kyi lam mngon du bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
159a4(1): pos/ nyid kyis nga rgyal bskyed pa'i phyir// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o// ye nas rnam par rgyal ba'i ye shes dbyings las 'das// ye shes rnam par dag pas gcig pa'i phyir// grol ba'i las kyi
159a5(1): mtshan nyid yod pa min// gcig dang du ma'i mtha' las 'das pa na// chos kyi dbyings kyi mi mnyam rnam par spang // gzugs kyi mtshan nyid gang yin sangs rgyas pa// thos bsam smon lam btab pas don mi
159a6(1): rnyed// chos sku gcig pa'i dam pa ma mthong na// 'ja' tshon sgyu mar 'phags pa'i skur dpyad pas// bsod nams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba min// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos nyid chen po 'di// chos kyi
159b1(1): dbyings las sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid med// chos kyi dbyings las sgyu mar gang bsgrubs kyang // sgyu rtsal rgyal ba'i lam du yongs ma bsngags// mi gnas chos sku brjod med las 'das pa// dbu mar brjod du med de
159b2(1): don dang bral// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin sbyang ba bral ba na// mkha' bzhin mtha' kun med de phyogs dang bral// zhi dang ma zhi med de chos rnams med// re dang dogs med mnyam pa'i rgyal po che// mtshan med dgongs
159b3(1): pa dag pas bsgom mi dgos// byar med lam las 'das pa'i lam mi rtsal// rmad byung sku mchog nyid las skur mi bsgom// re dogs kun bral zhi bas rgyas btab pas// phyag rgya bzhi ni sku mchog nyid kyi
159b4(1): nad// sku gsum rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ste// rang byung ye nas ldan pa'i chos kyi sku// 'gyur med lhun gyis rdzogs pas bsod nams sku// 'byung 'jug cir yang snang bas sprul pa'i sku// byed spyod kun
159b5(1): rdzogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// btsal med snying po byang chub rdzogs pa'i sku// thams cad lhun gyi bdag nyid yin pas na// zin rtsol ngal bas byang chub mchog tshol ba// rnyed pa'i dus med srin las bal
159b6(1): skyes tshul// rgyal bar rtag par bzhugs pa nga nyid pas// rtag tu bde 'gro thar pa'i lam 'dod na// grol ba'i lam chen nang la blta bar byos// grol ba'i lam zhugs drang por 'khor sa med// ma phyin 'gro/
160a1(1): sar phyin pa nye lam mchog/ rtag tu rgyal nyid mchod na rgyal ba mnyes// sangs rgyas zhing sbyong mi dgos thams cad rgyas// khyab sku ye nas brdal ba kun gyi lam// ye shes sna tshogs rgyan bkram
160a2(1): sbyin btang bas// 'khor lo'i bsgyur rgyal nor ltar mtsho thigs 'dra// ye shes chos dbyings brgyan pa'i sbyin pa ni// zad pa'i dus med nam mkha' chen po'i tshul// nor btang gling gcig byur bur btang gyur
160a3(1): nas// rgyal la sogs pa kun la phul byas pa'ang // chu thigs ltar gyis blangs bzhin zad par 'gyur// khu byug dus bsrung gzhan gyis mi 'gyur ltar// dbang phyug mnga' brnyes gzhan la rag mi lus// khu byug
160a4(1): gis ni gzhan gyi yid sdud ltar// kun rdzogs mchog gi sku yis thams cad sdud// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mes chen po// zhing khams dag pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi lha// dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor lo
160a5(1): rdzogs pa'i sku// rgyal kun mchod par 'dod na bdag nyid mchod// dkon mchog gsum mchod 'du shes med pa bdag la gnas pa dbang lnga thob// rdo rje theg pa'i dam tshig mi 'dor ba// nyon mongs lnga po'i
160a6(1): las kun spyod pa dang // sems can kun la snying brtse med pa dang // ma byin len dang mi tshangs spyod pa dang // phyag rgyar mi rtsol gzhan la mi rtsol ba// rtag par rgyal ba mi 'da'i dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje theg
160b1(1): pa'i ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin dam pa nyid// nam mkha'i khams bzhin rang bzhin mnyam gnas pa// sems la dmigs pa'i bdag nyid med par bsam// lha yi phyag rgya gsal ba'i
160b2(1): ting nge 'dzin// ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med pa yin// rdo rje theg pa'i spyod pa dag pa ni// dka' thub mi mnga' gtsang sbrar mi rtog cing // brtul zhugs gsum ldan sems can thams cad gsod// zas
160b3(1): mchog bshang gci za zhing rnal 'byor don la brtson// nyon mongs lnga spyod byang chub chen po 'chang // mtshams med lnga spyod ye shes rol par rtogs// rdo rje theg pa'i lta ba'i ngo bo la blta ba// shes rab 'bar
160b4(1): ba'i me chen 'od gsal bas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis kyang me 'od bsregs// dkyil 'khor gsum du mi blta de bzhin nyid mi gdab// snang stong phyag rgyar mi 'dod mnyam nyid ting 'dzin 'das// gang la
160b5(1): mi brten gang la'ang grub pa med// gdod nas mtha' dag de bzhin de bzhin nyid// de yi tshig 'das sangs rgyas la sangs rgyas// rdo rje theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu bstan pa'o// ma btsal ma bsgrubs rang bzhin
160b6(1): gnas pa'i sa// sa rdzogs pad+ma can dang kun tu 'od las 'das// 'bras bu lhun grub ye nas dag pa'i sa// rdo rje theg pa'i lta ba dang / dam tshig dang / spyod pa dang / bsgom pa dang / rang bzhin dang / 'bras bu
161a1(1): kun gcig yin par bstan// lha spyod ting 'dzin rgyu 'bras gcig gi ngang // gang la spyad kyang 'jug lta 'bras bu rdzogs// rdo rje theg pa'i 'bras bu thob nas yon tan ci 'byung ba bstan pa/ gab
161a2(1): tshe'i nor ltar thams cad kun 'dus shing / nam mkha' bzhin du ma g.yos ngang gis 'char/ bkra shis pa rig pa'i khu byug gi rgyud las/ rdo rje theg pa'i nga rgyal bstan pa dang / rdo rje theg pa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i
161a3(1): le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas/ rgyud kyi bdag po la bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das/ chen po'i chen po/ mchog tu gyur pas/ chen po khyod ni
161a4(1): che ba'o// bzang po'i bzang po bdag med phyogs bral dam par gyur pa khyod ni lta ba'o// kun mkhyen kun gzigs kyi ye mkhyen rang rig nyid de sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs so// kun sdud kun rdzogs kun gyi
161a5(1): 'bras bu khyod la mi 'bral rtag phyag 'tshal// sku yi sku ste sna tshogs 'dul ba yi sku// chos sku dpag med rtag phyag 'tshal// gsung gi gsung ste sna tshogs 'dus pa'i gsung // gsung mchog kun tu grags pa khyod
161a6(1): la'ang rtag phyag 'tshal// thugs kyi thugs te sna tshogs 'dus pa'i de bzhin nyid de de la'ang rtag tu bdag phyag 'tshal// mi 'da' 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig rdo rje can gyi sku khyod la'ang rtag phyag
161b1(1): 'tshal// kun byas dbang phyug kun gyi sna tshogs kun gyi dpal// mgon khyod la'ang rtag tu bdag phyag 'tshal// dkyil 'khor snying po dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po khyod la mchod pa 'bul// khyod
161b2(1): kyi rang bzhin sbubs kyis ma g.yogs gang yang med pas khyod ni byams pa'i mchog/ yangs pa chen po khyod kyi sgo nas 'jug pa'i dpa' bo 'jug mkhan de la'ang rtag phyag 'tshal// snying po'i snying por blta ba'i
161b3(1): lta snying can de la'ang gzhan phyag 'tshal// kye bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das/ re mdzes dbang phyug khyod ni gzhar mi gtong bar 'dod// rdo rje mchog 'dzin bdag gis gzhan phyag 'tshal// de bzhin
161b4(1): sems dpa' rnams kyang phyag 'tshal bar shog/ yang dam khyod la phyag 'tshal ba ni bkra shis mchog bkra shis/ zhes rgyud kyi bdag po la bstod nas/ mchog tu lan gsum phyag 'tshal nas/ yang bstod pa/ rgyud
161b5(1): kyi rgyal po che mchog la/ gdong du thal mo zung sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te/ sems dpa' dag pas khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstod pa'i rgyal po rab tu bstod pas bstod// de ltar bstod pas mchog khyod grags
161b6(1): nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstod pa de ldan shog/ ces rgyud kyi rgyal po la bstod pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la rgyud gtad pa// kye rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje
162a1(1): 'chang chen po// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs te thugs kyi bdag/ rgyal bar bstod pa'i lha yi lha khyod la// thugs rje che ba'i thugs kyi gter chen mdzod// rdo rje theg pa theg pa'i blar gyur pa// bstan pa
162a2(1): chen po rdo rje 'dzin la bstod// rdo rje 'dzin par khyod ni bsngags pa'i phyir// rgyud mchog rgyal po'i bstan pa gzung du gsol// skyes bu thabs la mkhas pa'i dpal ldan la// rgyal ba skye ba'i gsang mchog
162a3(1): gtad do gtad// ces rdo rje 'dzin pa bos nas/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po gtad do// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ gdong du thal mo bzung nas/ kye bcom ldan
162a4(1): 'das legs so legs so// bde bar gshegs pa legs so legs so// yongs su gtad pa'i rgyud gyi rgyal po 'di// chud ma zos par gsang bar gtad pas na// legs par gzung la brten par bya ba
162a5(1): yis// rdo rje 'chang ba min na gsang bar bgyi ba'am/ rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa 'di su la gtad ces bcom ldan 'das chen po la zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khyod bzhin 'dzin cing
162a6(1): gsang ba'i rdo rjes 'gro don 'dod la/ khyod la gtad pa ji bzhin du// de bzhin de bzhin gtad par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa ma yin yang // skyes bu seng ge'i sems yod cing // rab tu gces dang yid 'thad
162b1(1): pa'i// nor gyi dbyig tu gang 'gyur dang // rin chen nor bus gang bkang nas// rin chen nor bu'i theg pa 'di/ chad dam/ gang zhig rgyud 'di 'dzin par byed pa la// 'phral du nor dbyig mi ster na// de la
162b2(1): seng ge'i sems med pas// de ni sgyu mkhan dmyal sogs mkhan// 'dis ni dngos grub nges mi thob// de la 'di yi dbang yang med// bdud kyis bslus pa'i mi de ni// kha gsags g.yo sgyus 'di bzung
162b3(1): bas// rdo rje 'dzin min bdud kyi bu// 'di la 'dod pa'i bar chad nas// tshe 'di'i bsam pa kun yal te// 'di yi bag chags ci byas kyang // sku mkhan yi dwags gnas su skye// de phyir rgyud mchog 'di gtad
162b4(1): na// nga yis khyod la gtad pa bzhin// rim gyis de bzhin gtad par bya'o// dus ngan smin par gyur pa'ang // 'phral du nor dbyig mi ster na// ma rabs de la 'di snod med// gtod dang 'dzin pa gnyis ka/
162b5(1): ni// rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro// bkra shis pa rig pa'i khu byug gi rgyud las/ rgyud kyi rgyal po la bstod pa dang / rgyud gtad pa dang / phyis ji ltar gtad par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun
162b6(1): pa'o// // bkra shis pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sid+ha dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o// //
163a1(1): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA san+ti dr-iSh+Ti dz+nyA na nim+b+ha pAR+ShA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun rig chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal
163a2(1): lo// 'di skad go zhing rtogs pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun rig rgyal po de/ rang byung sems la ngo bo nyid kyi sku// de nyid chos sku ston pa kun tu bzang // 'o na min bde chen gnas mchog
163a3(1): chos kyi dbyings// phyi nang med par mdzes shing 'od gsal ba'i// yid bzhin rgyan kyis spras shing blta na sdug/ yangs dog med pa'i gzhal yas khang na bzhugs// gsung ba mi mnga' chos nyid rang bzhin
163a4(1): ni// rang gi sems nyid brjod du med pa'i don// ye nas ma bcos rang gi ngo bo nyid// skye med thugs la rang bzhin don gyis gsang // ma rig ye shes gdod nas med pa'i dus// snga phyi'i sems la 'pho 'gyur
163a5(1): med pa'i tshe// ngo mtshar rmad byung chos nyid rgyal po de// ma btsal sems las byung bas ngo bo nyid kyi sku// der 'dus nyid las mi gzhan rigs lnga'i 'khor// rig pas 'dus pa sa bcu'i sems dpa'i
163a6(1): 'khor// sprul pa chos skyong mkha' 'gro dang nyan 'khor// ting nge 'dzin la 'dus nas yid kyis 'khor// de'i tshe 'khor rnams zhi gnas kyi bsam gtan la zhen pa'i rtog pa gsal bar gzigs nas/ 'di skad
163b1(1): ces rdo rje sems dpas gsol to// bsgom med gnas lugs don ni gang la bya// snod bcud skal ldan gang gis gzung bar bgyi// ston pa kun rig rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba'i tshig
163b2(1): gsan thugs kyis ni// 'dus pa'i tshogs la kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// bsgom med lta ba'i gnas lugs ngas bshad du// sangs rgyas kun kyang sngangs shing skrag pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin srin po yi
163b3(1): dwags grul bum tshogs// 'jig rten lha mi rnams kyang sngangs 'gyur bas// rgyud 'di la ni 'gal sems sdig can rnams// dmyal bar nges 'gro gtan du snying re rje// dper na rgya mtsho ma lus kun brgal
163b4(1): yang // yid bzhin nor bu rnyed par dka' ba bzhin// snod ldan slob ma dad ldan shin tu dkon// de phyir shin tu gsang ba'i gter du bzhag/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ don gyi
163b5(1): gsang bar gsungs pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de skad ces bka' stsal pas 'khor gyis don go nas/ gdung ba bton nas yid kyis don gsol pa// ma rig las kyi sdug bsngal 'khyams pa'i
163b6(1): sems// rnam rtog dra ba gang gis gcod pa'i thabs// thugs rje chen pos mi 'dzin yi re chad// sgrib pa'i mun pas 'thibs pa snying re rje// 'gro drug sdug bsngal mi grol yi re mug/ rang sems sa 'khor dag
164a1(1): la sa mkhan mdzod// sems can las la thugs rje yi chad kyang // snying rjes 'gro don thugs dam mi mdzad dam// sems can lha mi rnams ni shes pa rtsing // dbang po yul la yengs pa'i sems
164a2(1): 'dzin gyis// 'tsho ba dkon zhing tshe thung nad mang bas// thar lam mi thob skye shi 'chi la rtag/ de phyir lus ngag 'dus byas chos spyod kyang // long med mtha' ring bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyir// snying po man ngag
164a3(1): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid thugs rjes gsungs/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ gdung ba bton pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i
164a4(1): tshogs kyi nang nas rdo rje sems dpa' la thugs kyis gzigs nas nges par bka' stsal pa// bsgom du med la mi 'bral gdams ngag rgyun// rdo rje sems dpas thugs nas brgyud pa yis// nga yis byin gyis
164a5(1): brlabs pa'i mkhas pa la// rang sems rtogs 'dod slob ma las can gyis// dad pas shin tu rang nyid dul byas pas// lus dang longs spyod srog la mi blta bar// sring mo bu mo la sogs rab brgyan te// rta
164a6(1): dang glang po nor gyi dbyig rnams kyang // ser sna med pas bla ma dag la dbul// de yang 'dus pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// chos phyir brtson 'grus che la dam tshig ldan// blo brtan shes rab zab cing don
164b1(1): gsang thub// tshul shis dang bzang rnams kyi don gyi gter// de dag yon tan brgya ldan slob ma la// rab tu gsang ste don nyid ston pa yi// bla ma mkhas pa mtha' bcu rdzogs pa la// mnyen zhing dal la thugs
164b2(1): rje rab ldan zhing // srid par chos rnams zhus kyang zad med pa'i// dam pa'i mdzod kyi gter ldan ston la mkhas// dper na seng ges 'jigs pa rtsad gcod bzhin// blo dngos gcig par ston la gus pas
164b3(1): zhus// de nas 'dus pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// yang dag don gyi lta ba gsang ba 'di// gang zag phyin ci log dang blta dman pa// thos pa chung la blo rtul shes rab med// nor phangs kha ral la sogs snod
164b4(1): med la// 'di bstan gnyis ka bsreg phyir rab tu gsang // de skad gsungs ma thag tu yid dga' nas// 'khor rnams snod kyi don dang ldan par ni// khas blangs rang dam bcas nas yid bsdus te// mgrin
164b5(1): gcig lhags nas 'khod gyur to// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ snod bcud bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan kun rig rgyal po yis// ched du brjod
164b6(1): pa'i don 'di bka' stsal to// 'gro drug sems can med pa'i gong rol du// sangs rgyas med pas ye shes ming yang med// kun bzang nyid kyang glo bur sangs rgyas te// ma bcos gdod nas mi rtog blos
165a1(1): bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas nyid kyang gdeng med gol ba'i lam// 'og ma'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor smos ci dgos// de skad gsungs pa'i don gsungs ma zag tu/ 'khor rnams sems 'drog ste yid
165a2(1): ma rangs te sems kyi don la the tshom du gyur nas/ ting nge 'dzin la yid byung bar gyur to// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ ched du brjod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas
165a3(1): sems dpa' rdo rjes 'khor rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas sems rtog bsal ba'i phyir don 'di zhus so// don gyi sangs rgyas ye shes gang las byung // don las 'pho 'gyur med pa'i blta ba gang // snang
165a4(1): la 'pho 'gyur sna tshogs ci las byung // ma bsgoms skye bor mi gol thabs ci lags// blo dngos gcig pur rtogs pa'i tshad ni gang // de skad yid kyis gsol ba'i don gsan nas// ston pa kun rig rgyal po
165a5(1): chos rje yis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rin chen sgo phye nas// sangs rgyas dpal gyi mgur nas bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das gzhi ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku// don gyi sangs rgyas rang sems don rtogs na// kun tu
165a6(1): bzang po rang byung bcom ldan 'das// ye shes rab tu che mchog chos kyi sku// mi skye mi 'gag nam mkha'i ngang bzhin no// 'khrul rtog nyid kyang ye shes bde ba'i klong // dper na khyung chen gshog rdzogs mkha' la
165b1(1): lding ba ni// chu klung ri rab gyen thur nyam mi nga // bar snang nam mkha'i khams kun lam du bde// gang du dmigs pa'i sa phyogs phyin par byed// de bzhin ye nas sems sbyangs rnal 'byor thugs// sangs rgyas
165b2(1): snying por rtogs pa'i skal ldan rnams// chos sku mngon du grub pa'i gdams ngag can// sems rtog ye shes yon tan de las byung // rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ sangs rgyas kyi
165b3(1): ye shes 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas ston pa kun rig rgyal po des de skad ces gsang ba'i don gsungs pa dang 'khor rnams kyi rtog pa sangs nas gus pa'i bsam pa mthun par gyur
165b4(1): cing yid dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal po la bstod pa// ded dpon sangs rgyas kun bzang chos kyi sku// 'khor ba dong sbugs ye shes klong ston pa// rang rig rgyal po byang chub ye shes
165b5(1): sku// 'khor ba'i ming med sangs rgyas lam ston pa// gzugs med chos kyi sgra la yid kyis bstod// de skad bstod pa'i don gsan yid kyis ni// kun rig rgyal po ston pa chos rje yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi
165b6(1): tshogs la bka' stsal pa// de nyid gdeng du go gyur rnal 'byor pas// mi bsgom ched du mi blta rang yin te// sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis// ma bsgoms dbang po rang yan btang las
166a1(1): byung // skye bo mu stegs phyi nang 'brel chod phyir// gol sa dag tu mi 'gyur don nyid yin// de ltar shin tu rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// skye ba 'di las mi len sangs rgyas nyid// don la the tshom mi
166a2(1): za sangs rgyas chos nyid de// rang byung rgyal po byang chub sems nyid kyang // ma btsal rang la yod pas bsgrub mi dgos// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ 'khor rnams kyi rtog pa'i
166a3(1): gdung ba bsal ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor la phan gdags pa'i phyir kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas rgyal po chos kyi sku mchog kyang // 'khor 'das reg pa med
166a4(1): par sems la rdzogs// don la 'gyur ba med pas blta ba'i lam// yul la mi ltos rang sems chos kyi sku// nam mkha' bzhin du ye shes mtha' mnyam pas// gzhi la 'gyur med rang rig byang chub
166a5(1): sems// skyon gyis ma gos sems kyi dran pa la// 'pho 'gyur med pas chos nyid brdal ba'i sku// mi skye mi 'gag lta ba rang byung la// bsgoms pas mi rnyed rang sems 'gyur med don// ma bsgoms 'bral med
166a6(1): da lta nga yi sems// bskal par 'khyams kyang sems la skye shi med// shi med nor mchog rig pa lta ba'i mchog/ don la ma bsgoms ye shes mthar phyin lam// sangs rgyas re ba med pas ltung mi srid// gdod
166b1(1): mas 'gyur med byang chub chen po yin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ don la 'pho 'gyur med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas kun rig chos rjes don gsungs
166b2(1): pa// dad pas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// 'khor 'das rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pas// dbang po yul rnams ji ltar bltas par bden// don la mi bden gzung 'dzin mthu brtas pas// ji
166b3(1): ltar goms pa brtas pas der snang phyir// dngos po blos brtags pas na yod min te// yod na sems can kun la mthun snang rigs// gdod nas rang 'khrul bsgribs pa'i lus nyid kyis// 'gro drug mthong
166b4(1): rtog so so sna tshogs pa// de phyir sems can rang sems so sor snang // ngo bo nyid kyi sku la 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir// blo yis brtags pas gcig yul gcig min pas// rang sems ma 'khrul snang ba the tshom
166b5(1): med// des na gzhan yul rnams ni gdod nas med// 'khrul pa'i rtog sems 'gro ba so so'i sems// gcig na dge sdig rnam smin 'bras bu yang // sems can ma spyad kun gyis myong bar rigs// las kyi
166b6(1): rnam smin thun mong mi 'gyur phyir// bag chags brtas pa'i 'khrul pa'i sdug bsngal yin/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ snang ba 'pho 'gyur sna tshogs don las mi 'gal bar bstan
167a1(1): pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas kun rig ston pa snang mdzad kyis// 'dus pa'i dad ldan 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ma bsgoms dbang po rang yan bzhag gyur kyang // phyi rol yul gyi tha
167a2(1): snyad grags pa la// 'khrul pa yin par shes phyir zhen pa med// chos brgyad rang sar grol bas mnyam pa'i phyir// skye bo nyid kyang ma spangs chos kyi sku// dper na a shu ka nyid bdud rtsir shes pa ltar// de bzhin
167a3(1): skye bo rang sems 'di nyid ni// bla ma'i don bstan tha mal byang chub sems// bdag nyid snying po ye shes don nyid yin// de yang 'dus pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje nyid// nyid kyi don ma rtogs pas so so'i skye bo
167a4(1): ste// de nyid lung dang man ngag don rtogs kyis// rang sems rtogs pas skye bo med pa'i phyir// ma bsgoms go la sa med par mkhas pas gsungs// ngo bo nyid la rtag chad med pa'i phyir// sems der rang
167a5(1): gsal don zin mi brjod pas// phyal pa lung ma bstan du gol sa med// dper na gser 'gyur rtsis gang thebs pa rnams// thams cad gser las gzhan du mi 'gyur bzhin// de bzhin mu stegs skye bo'i
167a6(1): sems nyid kyang // man ngag gser rtsis thebs pa'i sems// mu stegs rnams kyang ye shes bde ba'i ngang // yul la mi zhen phyin na bsgom du med// rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i don nyid kyis// sna tshogs
167b1(1): zhen las grol phyir bsgom mi dgos/ rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ ma bsgoms kyang skye bo dang mu stegs kyi gol sa med par bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas 'dus
167b2(1): pa'i snying po 'khor rnams la kun rig ston pa chos rjes bka' stsal pa// sems can ma 'khrul sangs rgyas med pa'i gong // ngo bo nyid kyi sku la rang byung sems// de nyid ye nas gnas lugs yin pa'i phyir// de
167b3(1): rtogs chos sku mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// kun tu bzang po rang byung ye shes thugs// rang sems rang gis rig pas chos kyi rje// rang sems rang 'khrul 'gro drug sems can te// kun gzhi'i gzhi cha chos sku ye
167b4(1): shes la// gsum ldan 'khor ba'i sgrib pa'i lus nyid yin// dus tshod bla ma'i gdams ngag don bstan pa// gzhi cha chos sku rang byung de nyid dang // dang po'i sems nyid ngo bo nyid kyi sku// snga phyis ma bslad chos
167b5(1): skur gcig pa'i phyir// blo dngos gcig pa'i don la bsgom mi dgos// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// sangs rgyas ye shes thugs dang sems can sems// 'brel med so sor snang ba ma yin
167b6(1): te/ btsal med rang sems chos skur gcig pa'i phyir// blo dngos gcig par sems nyid yid ches yin// 'khor ba'i lus 'di sdug bsngal sgrib g.yogs dang // sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes bde ba de// 'khor
168a1(1): 'das gnyis ka rtsa ba gcig pa'i phyir// lhun gyis grub pa dag tu blo dngos gcig/ 'khor ba'i mngal nyid rnal 'byor thugs nyid kyang // ngo bo nyid las ma 'das don yin phyir// tha mal 'di
168a2(1): nyid yin rtogs chos sku la// blang dor med pas blo dngos ngo bo gcig/ dper na chu nyid chang du rkyen gyis 'gyur// de bzhin bar do'i rang sems 'di nyid la// bla ma'i rkyen gyis rtogs pas bsgom mi
168a3(1): dgos// mi bsgom phyir na gol med blo dngos gcig/ de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// ye shes rtogs nas mnyam pa'i don nyid la// rgyun du ma brjed rig pa gsal theb na// bag chags nyon
168a4(1): mongs rtog pa'i skyon gyis kyang // de la rdul tsam mi bsgrib ye shes gsal// dper na skyes bu sngags kyi gdeng ldan pas// dug ma bsal bas dug nyid sman du 'gyur ba bzhin// snga phyir ma song chos sku ye shes
168a5(1): ni// snga phyir ma spangs glo bur rang stong phyir// blo dngos dbyer med rtogs pa'i tshad yin no// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ blo dngos gcig par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
168a6(1): pa'o// // de nas sems dpa' rdo rje snying po yis// dad pas 'dus pa'i 'khor la phan gdags phyir// bden pa'i don gyis 'di skad yid kyis gsol// rang sems snying po don rtogs lta ba la// ma
168b1(1): bsgoms 'bral med don ni ji ltar 'grub// ye shes don ni mtshon du ji ltar med// spyod pa 'ching grol med pa'i don ni gang // sa la sbyang du med pa'i don ni ci// rtogs nas dam tshig bsrung nyams ji ltar
168b2(1): med// bsgoms na gol sa'i skyon ni ji ltar lags// la bzla'i don gyi ye shes gang la bgyi// de skad gsol ba'i yid kyi don gsan nas// kun rig ston pa chos rjes bka' stsal pa// rang sems snying po'i
168b3(1): don rtogs chos sku las// bsgom bya'i ye shes chos sku gud na med// snga phyi sems kyi ye shes mtha' bral ba// ma nor sgom pa po yang ga la yod// de la sgom mkhan sems la dngos med na// mi gnas mi rtog
168b4(1): 'jog pa rnal 'byor min// sems dpa' rdo rje snying po da nyon cig/ a ti rdzogs chen chos sku bden gnyis bral// ngo bo nyid kyi rang shar ye shes ni// yod med dbus kyi ye shes mtha' gsum bral// yul la
168b5(1): spang sdud gnyis po gdod nas med// dper na nam mkha' rang du shes pa bzhin// ji bzhin ma nor rang sems rtogs pa yis// lus ngag ma skyes rtog pa'i gzhi med pas// skyil krung drang 'dug sgra bcad kha na
168b6(1): da/ de bzhin sems dang rtag chad spros bral bas// rtog sbrang mi rtog sgom pa'i khar mi 'ong // ye shes lta ba'i shugs las byung bas na// rnal 'byor dmigs pa'i shes pas mi bsgom ste// rtogs pas rang
169a1(1): sems ma skyes ye shes phyir// rnal 'byor ched du bsgom pa bstan mi dgos// sems dpa' 'dus pa'i snying po de nyon cig/ yul gyi snang ba spyod yul ma grub phyir// nam mkha' lta bur ye shes rang
169a2(1): gsal bas// rang sems chos sku ngang gis de rtogs pas// rnal 'byor ci yang yid la mi bsgom na// yang dag lta ba'i don dang mthun par 'grub// sems dpa' rdo rje snying po da nyon cig/ rdzogs chen go la sa
169a3(1): gcad phyir bsgom med de// ye shes bsgom med dag tu rab rtogs na// bsgoms kyang skyon med chos dbyings nam mkha' 'dra// bsgom med de ni kun gyi re ba skongs// kun la khyab cing ma rdzogs med mod
169a4(1): kyi// kun gyis gdams ngag ma 'phrod rtogs par dka'/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ ma bsgoms 'bral ba med pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas kun rig rgyal po
169a5(1): chos rjes bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams yid kyis da nyon cig/ rang sems ngo bo nyid kyi chos sgra ni// dbang po mngon sum mi gnas kun la khyab// chos sgra tshig tu 'di zhes bstan par ni// rdo rje
169a6(1): sems dpas kyang ni mtshon du med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' yid kyis nyon// 'khor 'das tshig las 'das pa'i ye shes te// dbyibs dang kha dog dbang po'i spyod yul du// sangs rgyas nyid kyis bstan cing
169b1(1): mtshon du med// mtshon cing bstan par dka' ba'i rang sems de// yod med kun las 'das pas byang chub sems// dngos med yid la dran pa'i ye shes ni// kun bzang nyid kyis ma gzigs blta ba'i
169b2(1): mchog/ gzung 'dzin mthu brtas rnam smin lus 'di la// dbang po'i yul rnams ming du rjod byed de// don la phan pa rdul tsam mtshon mi nus// dper na bum pa nang gi nam mkha' la// dngos med brjod med
169b3(1): nam mkha' chen po min// de bzhin tshe gcig mi rtog don bsgoms kyang // ye shes rang shar chen po'i blta ba min// bum chag nam mkha' chen por thim pa bzhin// lus bral rang sems ngo bo nyid kyi sku// de
169b4(1): nyid rig pas gsal btab bde ba'i klong // de tsam nyid na kun tu bzang pos kyang // ngo bo nyid kyi sku la mtshon du med/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ ye shes kyi don la mtshon du
169b5(1): med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas dad pas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rjes bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa ji lta bu// rang gi mtshan nyid
169b6(1): ma bcos de bzhin nyid// chos sku skye med rtogs nas 'gro don du// ji ltar snang ba'i gzugs can sprul pa'i sku// mdzad pa bcu gnyis 'gro don mthar phyin pa// thugs rje sprul pas 'gro ba kun 'dul
170a1(1): yang // ye shes blo ldan rlom sems rdul tsam med// bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa med pa'i phyir// ye nas gnyis med gcig ni chos kyi sku// mthun 'jug 'tshams pa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho ni// thugs
170a2(1): rje chen pos 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad// rang byung ye shes dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // 'gro ba'i dpal mgon kun tu bzang po ni// bdag dang gzhan don blang dor med pa'i phyir// spyod pa rgya mtsho sna
170a3(1): tshogs ci bder spyod// pad+ma skye ba'i rgyu ni 'dam yin te// pad+ma la ni 'dam gyis gos pa med// chos nyid blang dor med par rtogs gyur na// ye shes rtog med nyams pa rdul tsam med// thun mtshams mi bsgom
170a4(1): rgyun gyi rnal 'byor la// 'ching grol spyod pa med phyir gol ba med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ spyod pa 'ching grol med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de
170a5(1): nas kun rig ston pa chos rjes bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis da nyon cig/ sa med chos sku rdzogs chen ye shes la// gang yang mi 'gro sa mchog spyi bcings pa// bgrod med sems nyid ye
170a6(1): shes mchog gi lam// ye shes chos sku mthar phyin chos nyid sa// sems dpa' rdo rje snying po da nyon cig/ sa ni dang po 'khor bar mi ldog par// snying po byang chub mchog ni yin zhes na// bza' zhing bgrod pa'i
170b1(1): yul ni ga la yod// byar med rdzogs pa'i ngang du rab rtogs na// lam la bza' zhing sa sbyang yul las 'das// bgrod med snying po lam gyi don ston pa// gzhan nas btsal bas rnyed par mi 'gyur te// ye shes
170b2(1): chen po'i kun tu khyab gnas pas// rang byung ye nas rang rig 'od gsal bas// sa lam btsal du med pa snying po'i don// rnam par snang mdzad che mchog kun tu bzang // de yang sems dpa' rdo rje snying po
170b3(1): nyon// dper na rgyal po gzhan du mi 'gro bzhin// rang sems yul la mi bskyod don la gnas// de tsam nyid na chos sku bde ba'i klong // lam la ma bgrod chos nyid ye shes sku// sa dang lam la bgrod na byang
170b4(1): chub gegs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ sa la sbyang du med pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas dad pas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rjes bka'
170b5(1): stsal pa// dam tshig bsrung nyams med pa'i ye shes ni// 'og ma bzhin du dam du ma bcas pas// nyams pa med phyir ye bsrungs chen po yin// gdeng ldan blta ba'i dam tshig rgyun du dran// ched du ma yin dang
170b6(1): gis don gsal bas// ye bsrungs chen po'i dam tshig lta ba yin// ye nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// theg pa'i khyad par ji snyed grags pa dang // tshul khrims sdom dang phyi nang dam tshig
171a1(1): kyang // 'gro ba gdul bya ji ltar 'dod la bstan// tha snyad tsam du gdul bya zhes brjod kyang // dam du bca' bar bya ba rdul tsam med// dam bca' med pa'i don gyi ngang rtogs na// dam du bcas
171a2(1): kyang skyon med nam mkha' 'dra// 'dus pa'i snying po rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// chos sku mi g.yo thugs kyi dam tshig ste// blang dor med par spyod pa dam tshig chen po yin// rang sems mi spang ye shes chen por
171a3(1): gnas// dus gsum don dam ma bral nyams pa med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ dam tshig bsrung nyams med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i
171a4(1): 'khor la bka' stsal pa// bsgoms na gol sar gyur pa 'khrul pa'i phyir// rang gi sems nyid ma rtogs rtsol ba ste// phyi yi yul gyi rtsol bas sems bsdus nas// 'og ma'i lta ba 'dod lugs rnam bzhi
171a5(1): la// gnyis med snang stong khas mi len pa rnams// so sor rtog pa'i rig pas gzhal byas nas// gsal ba stong pa'i mnyam gzhag don bsgoms pas// drug la sgom pa'i gang zag la// bying rgod mtha' dag
171a6(1): shes bzhin bya ra byed// de nyid blta ba ma shes gti mug ste// gsal la mi rtog bsgom dang 'dod chags bsgom pa rnams// bde la mi rtog zhen pa'i nga rgyal can// 'khor ba med dang lhung du dogs pa'i zhe sdang
171b1(1): gis// mi dmigs don la gza' gtad byas nas bsgom// rtsol bas bsgoms kyang yul la 'gyur med phyir// mi rtog 'dod phyir mngon par don dang bral// rtog pa bzang ngan ci skyes sems nyid du// dgag/
171b2(1): rgyu med pa tsam du blos bzung nas// gsal bde mi dmigs ched du bsgoms pas nor// yul la gtan tshigs gzhig pas smos ci dgos// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po yid kyis nyon// grib ma gzugs su bsgyur
171b3(1): ba ji bzhin du// lha dang rtsa ba'i thig le thabs bsgoms rnams// mtshan ma yul la dmigs phyir sgom pa pos// de nyid sems su blos byas phyir na gol// rkyen ma thub phyir gnas lugs chos sku min// de
171b4(1): phyir bsgoms na 'khor ba'i nad chen yin/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ bsgoms na gol sar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas yang kun rig ston pa kun bzang
171b5(1): gis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dga' dang gus pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig nyon// la bzla' ba yi ye shes don chen ni// kun gzhi gzhi cha mkha' la nyi shar bzhin// thams cad kun 'dus ye shes
171b6(1): rang snang gsal// ye nas btsal med 'bras bu mngon sangs rgyas// rgyal ba kun gyi yang mes chen po ste// gol med gdod nas dag pa chos kyi sku// rang byung 'gag pa med pas ye shes klong // lam lnga ma
172a1(1): bgrod ye shes sa yi mchog/ cir yang dmigs su med pas rang sems ye shes sku// gzhan la smon du med pas rang la rdzogs// chos sku 'di zhes gzhan nas mi rnyed pas// rtogs par 'dod na
172a2(1): rang gi sems la tshol// sems la don rnyed rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// 'khrul pa med phyir sems can 'khor ba med// rang sems rtogs pa'i don las ma gtogs pa// bde zhing skyid pa'i sangs rgyas logs
172a3(1): na med// de phyir rgyu la mi rtog 'bras bu med// med la rtsol ba rgya mtsho'i chu bor nas// smig rgyu ri dwags chur mthong bsnyeg pa bzhin// bsgom med don nyid bor nas sus bsgom pa// byang chub med par rang gi
172a4(1): sdug bsngal bsnon// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje yid kyis nyon// ye shes de nyid rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// ye shes bcud nyid chos kyi gter du smin// nam mkha'i go yangs 'byung ba'i lam du bde// rtogs
172a5(1): pa'i go yangs sangs rgyas lam du bde// sems nyid go yangs bsgom med lam du bde// dus gsum 'gyur med rang rig lta ba'i dbyings// 'dod dgu rang la yon tan tshang ba'i phyir// rgyu 'bras rang la rag ma
172a6(1): lus pas zab// dper na ma dros mtsho dkyil me 'bar ba// nam mkha'i dkyil nas babs pa'i chu yis ni// bskal par de la gnod pa mi nus bzhin// rang sems chos nyid rang byung ye shes la// 'khor bar
172b1(1): 'khyams kyang sgrib pas gos pa med// rin chen me 'od nam mkha' 'thon pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho nyid kyang bdud rtsir gyur pa bzhin// rang gis byang chub sems nyid rtogs tsam na// dug lnga nyid kyang ye shes chen por
172b2(1): 'char/ rdzogs pa'i chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ ye shes kyi don la bzla' ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs
172b3(1): la nges don phan gdags phyir// ston pa kun rig sems kyi rgyal po la// bden pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// dug lnga ma spangs rang grol ji ltar byung // che ba'i yon tan mi 'byung gang gis
172b4(1): bsgribs// tshogs ma bsags pa'i gzugs sku gang las 'byung // gong 'og the tshom gegs ni gang ltar gcad// the tshom chod pa'i nyams myong rtags ni gang // mnyam pa'i rgyal pos thugs kyis bstan du
172b5(1): gsol// de skad gsol ba'i don gsan thugs kyis bka' stsal pa// dug lnga ma spangs rang grol ye shes ni// rin chen 'od kyis mun pa med pa ltar// 'khor ba thog ma rtsad chod don gyi phyir// ngo bo nyid kyi sku
172b6(1): ni rang rtogs pas// gdod nas ma rig dag pas gti mug bral// de yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma rig med phyir zhe sdang yul mi dmigs// de phyir rang sems snying po chos sku la// snga phyi zhen
173a1(1): pa'i dbang gis zhe sdang na// kha dog yul la mnar sems byed pa'i phyir// ba mo la ni nyi ma shar ba bzhin// phyi 'brel bcad pa'i man ngag dran par bya// de yang dad ldan 'khor rnams yid kyis
173a2(1): nyon// 'dod chags skye ba'i yul ni sgo lnga 'byung ba'i sems// phyi rol zang zing nor la brkam chags nas// bung bas me tog gzhibs nas mi zhen ltar// chags pa nyid nas zhen med rang gi sems// sems
173a3(1): la byed pa med phyir sems nyid don du shes// sems can pho mo las kyi chags pa yang // rang sems chos nyid rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mi sdug gnyen po bsgom pa mi dgos par// yul la pho mo yod phyir
173a4(1): chags pa spyod gyur kyang // sems la pho mo med pas nyes pa med// de nyid dus nas rig pas gsal thebs pas// dus gsum pho mor sbyar kyang nyams pa med// de yang 'dus pa'i dad ldan yid kyis nyon//
173a5(1): rgyal chen po rang sems rtogs par 'char// de phyir khams kyi rab tu byed pa yin// gnyen po mi dgos rang grol byang chub sems// dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyi sprul pa yang // sems can yin zhes mkhas pas sgro/
173a6(1): mi 'dogs// de bzhin blo dngos gcig par rtogs pa yis// bsgom du yod sogs par ni nga rgyal med// 'dus pa'i snying po 'khor rnams da nyon cig/ blta ba nam mkha' lta bur 'phang chod rnal 'byor
173b1(1): pas// mtho la phrag dog mnyam la smad gyur kyang // mi len mi sdang mnyam pa chen po ste// ma ki ta yis thams cad sman du 'gyur ba bzhin// don dran ma nor man ngag gdeng gis 'phangs// bla ma'i bka' nod
173b2(1): ye shes rnal 'byor la// dug lnga ma spangs rang grol ye shes thugs/ rdzogs pa chen po blta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ nyon mongs ma spangs rang grol du bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad
173b3(1): pa'o// // de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas yon tan mtshan dang dpe byad de// stobs dang mi 'jigs chos ni bco brgyad dang // dus ni da lta 'byung ba lus kyis
173b4(1): bsgribs// dper na khyung chen sgo nga'i nang na gshog rgyas kyang // sgo nga ma chag 'phur mi nus pa bzhin// rang sems chos skur rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor kyang // lus 'dir che ba'i yon tan mi 'byung phyir// thun mong
173b5(1): sman gyi sbyor ba'i thabs kyis ni// rtsi sbyor sman dang ril bu bcud len gyis// rang lus 'di nyid gsos gyur lus rgyas tshe// dug dang mtshon sogs mi tshugs grub gyur nas// mkha' la bya bzhin 'phur ba byung
173b6(1): nas ni// sems kyi mngon shes rmi lam mngon gyur te// lus 'di yul yin phyir na sems min pas// gnas skabs 'brel pa yod phyir rtags byung yang // sha khrag lus 'di ma bor bar du ni// sangs rgyas che/
174a1(1): ba'i yon tan 'byung mi srid// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// rang don grub pa thob pa rnams kyang ni// thabs kyis sbyor ba yin phyir lus kyis bsgribs// dper na me yod du ba 'byung
174a2(1): ba bzhin// rang sems ma bcos de dag gsal gyur na// che ba'i yon tan ma lus shugs kyis byung // sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtsa mchog grong khyer du// rang lus 'bor phyir sems can smos ci dgos// de phyir
174a3(1): bcom ldan 'das kyang rdo rje'i gdan thog tu// yang sangs rgyas pas mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// che ba'i yon tan ma lus lhun gyis rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ dus
174a4(1): 'dir sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mi 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rang sems ngo bo nyid du gsal gyur na// ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs
174a5(1): pas chos kyi sku// dper na rgya mtsho rnyog med dngas gyur na// nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba mi 'gag bzhin// chos nyid ngang las longs spyod rig pa'i rgyun// de yi sprul pa sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku// de yang
174a6(1): sems dpa' rdo rje yid kyis nyon// chu nyid tshags kyis btsags kyang gzugs brnyan med// med bzhin sems kyi ngo bo nyid la ni// kun bzang sangs rgyas nyid kyis gzugs btsal kyang // 'dod pas lus
174b1(1): las sangs rgyas rnyed mi srid// bsod nams tshogs kyis gzugs sku 'byung ba med// rim dgu ston pa sangs rgyas gzugs kyi sku// mos pa so sor 'dul phyir snang mod kyang // brgyud nas chos sku rtogs
174b2(1): pa'i thabs su bstan// smon lam dbang gis 'gro ba'i don byed pa// 'og ma'i blos bzhag sangs rgyas chos sku min// de phyir rang sems ma rtogs dge ba yis// rgyu med 'bras bu mi 'byung dpe bzhin
174b3(1): du// bskal pa stong du tshogs ni bsags byas kyang // 'bras bu gzugs sku'i sangs rgyas 'byung mi 'gyur// de yang 'dus pa'i dad ldan 'khor rnams nyon// gser sbrul mig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// dus
174b4(1): gcig nyams myong dpe bzhin rnal 'byor pas// ngo bo nyid kyi sku rtogs chos kyi sku// de la rig pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sna tshogs nyid na gsal thabs sprul pa'i sku// las med rtog par dka' phyir
174b5(1): gsang ba'i sgra// blo dngos gcig phyir mngon par byang chub ste// de rnams gcig gi yon tan lnga 'byung bas// sangs rgyas 'gro don btsal mi dgos pa'i phyir// sems can rnams la rang sems chos kyi
174b6(1): sku// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ chos sku rtogs na gzugs sku 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas kun rig ston pas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// the tshom
175a1(1): gegs ni bsal thabs bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das spyi yi mtshan nyid sems yin te// rtogs na kun kyang yin phyir ma rtogs min// a ti theg chen snying po rdzogs pa'i phyir// yod med gang nges
175a2(1): rtag chad skyon yin phyir// ma nges rgyu 'bras log pa'i kha rje kha// sangs rgyas 'bras bu ma thob snying rje'i gnas// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs yid kyis nyon// 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa'i chos rnams
175a3(1): kun// gnyis ka'i gzhi ni ngo bo chos skur nges// yul gyi snang ba ma nges sna tshogs pa// blang dor med phyir chos rnams lhan gyis grub// 'dus pa'i snying po'i gtso bos don gsol pa// yul nyid sems las
175a4(1): sems nyid yul yin na// yul nyid yin phyir yul la sdug bsngal rigs// sems nyid yul na rang rig bems por thal// spang sdud mi shes zhen pa skye ba'i blo// de phyir rdzogs chen chos sku bla med gang // de
175a5(1): yang 'khor gyi snying po yid kyis nyon// yul nyid spang sdud zhen pa rnams kyi skyon// blang dor med cing gnyen pos btsal mi dgos// de tsam nyid na bsam gtan mchog gi lam// de la gnyen po med phyir bla med
175a6(1): chos kyi sku// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams da nyon cig/ bsgom du yod med sgro skur mthar lhung phyir// bsgom pa'i zhi gnas mtha' la zhen pa ste// ma rtogs bsgom med don gyi gdeng dang bral// de phyir mtha'
175b1(1): yi blta ba nor ba'i lam// de yang dad ldan 'khor rnams yid kyis nyon// a ti man ngag chos sku'i snying po ni// bsgoms kyang 'gal med rang sems nam mkha' 'dra// ma bsgoms pas kyang chos sku rtogs bral
175b2(1): med// byang chub lam du sems nyid rtogs pa che// sems dpa' rdo rjes yid kyi don zhus pa// sangs rgyas sems can gcig gam tha dad lam// tha dad 'brel med thugs rjes phan mi nus// gcig na
175b3(1): 'gro drug sems can ci phyir byung // kun rig ston pas bka' stsal yid kyis nyon// de gnyis so sor snang ba ma yin te// rtogs na ngo bo gcig phyir thugs rje 'byung // rang sems ma rig rnam rtog sdug bsngal
175b4(1): yin// don la dbyer med sems nyid lhun gyis grub// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis sems don yid kyis zhus// sangs rgyas sems can rgyu 'bras yin gyur na// sangs rgyas las byung rnam gsum don med
175b5(1): 'gyur// sems can las byung tshogs gnyis dus mi rtog/ kun rig ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas sems can rgyu 'bras ro gcig phyir// ltos pas gcig la gcig byung ma yin te// gnyis
175b6(1): ka'i ngo bo rang sems chos skur gcig/ sangs rgyas sems can skyon yon rnam gnyis kyis// chos nyid 'khrul pa gang yang gzhi bzhag nas// gnyis ka ltar yang rtsod na mi 'gal phyir// ma rig ye shes gang rung
176a1(1): phyogs gzung na// kun kyang yin la thams cad min pa'i phyir// rgyu yod dang ni rgyu med gang 'khrul pa// gzhir bzhag ma nor shin tu gces par gsungs// sems dpa' rdo rjes 'khor gyi don
176a2(1): zhus pa// rang la yod pa mkhas pas 'di skad ston// ye nas yod na man ngag bstan mi dgos// med na ri bong rwa bzhin rgyu mi dmigs// kun rig ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ye nas rang la yod pa'i
176a3(1): chos sku ni// bla mas mtshon nas rang sems don bstan pas// ma rig rnam rtog chos skur shes pa las// logs na btsal nas bstan pa ma yin no// dad ldan 'khor gyis don chen yid kyis zhus// bla ma'i man/
176a4(1): ngag yul la mi rtog pa// tsam du nyams myong zhi gnas skyon yin phyir// rtogs na rang rgyud yin phyir man ngag min// ma dran 'du shes med pa nyid du thal// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje snying po nyon// yul la mi
176a5(1): rtog de nyid bsam gtan te// rtog dang mi dran gnyis ka'i gzhi nyid ni// thog mtha' chod pas chos nyid byang chub sems// de yang rang byung ye shes don rtogs na// yul nyid mi rtog mi bsgom don la
176a6(1): gnas// de yang man ngag gis bcos don dang 'gal// ma bcos man ngag bka' la dgos med 'gyur// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs yid kyis nyon// bla ma mkhas pa'i man ngag don zab mos// kun gzhi
176b1(1): gzhi cha chos sku'i ngo bo nyid// bcos su med la rang sems nam mkha' 'dra// sgo lnga yul nyid 'khrul phyir 'brel pa chod// yid la blta ba bstan pas nyon mongs grol// de phyir bka' don shin tu gces par
176b2(1): gsungs/ rdzogs pa chen po blta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyal po'i rgyud las/ the tshom gyi gegs bsal ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// blo dngos
176b3(1): gzhi la gnyis med rab rtogs na// ming gi tha snyad rnam grangs 'dzin med phyir// yul la mi zhen ma rig rang sar grol// btsal med bsam gtan nyams su myong ba'i rtags// phan gnod ji lta bu dang phrad gyur
176b4(1): nas// byams sdang gnyis kyi sems ni skyes pa'i tshe// mnyam nyid rig pas gsal thebs rnal 'byor de// blo dngos gnyis med nyams su myong ba'i rtags// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje da nyon cig/ kun tu bzang
176b5(1): po 'od dang bcas nas ni// dbang por mngon sum byon nas chos bstan kyang // bzang po yin pa'i sems kyis dang rgyu dang // gshin rje'i 'jigs pa byung yang nyam mi nga // gnyis pa 'khrul par rtogs phyir spang
176b6(1): len med// lta ba gdeng ldan nyams myong yin pa'i rtags// theg pa'i bye brag chos rnams ci gsungs kyang // don la bzang ngan med rtogs phyir na sgro skur bral// chos la bzod pa thob pa'i nyams myong
177a1(1): rtags// lus ngag yid gsum sdug bde ci byung yang // skyon yon mi blta rang sems 'khrul pa'i phyir// snga phyi med par lta ba'i gdeng ldan na// chos nyid rang gsal nyams su myong ba'i
177a2(1): rtags// lus dang mi mthun pa yi nad dang bgegs// byung yang bag chags dang ni nyon mongs pa// rtog pa brtas pa nyid las ma gtogs pa// zhen pa med phyir chos sku dad pa yis// mi gtong dran par byed
177a3(1): pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dngos grub rtsol med dgongs pa nyams myong rtags// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po da nyon cig/ byang chub sems la snga phyi med pa'i phyir// 'jig rten mthon dmar gar skyes lus nyid
177a4(1): kyang // skye 'gag med pa'i sems la sems gnas na// 'du 'bral med pa'i dgongs pa nyams myong rtags// rtags chen de ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis ni// ci spyod thams cad ye shes sangs rgyas thugs// mi
177a5(1): yi lus la sgrib g.yogs 'di nyid la// lha mi rnams kyis phyag 'tshal mchod par 'gyur/ rdzogs pa chen po blta ba ye shes gting rdzogs rgyal po'i rgyud las/ rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis
177a6(1): pa'o// // de nas sems dpa' rdo rje snying po yis// dad ldan 'khor la phan gdags phyir// mnyam pa'i rgyal po kun bzang la// yid kyi dran pas 'di skad don gsol pa/ blta ba nyams pa'i rnal 'byor
177b1(1): skyon ni gang // de la skong thabs ji ltar bstan par bgyi// bskangs pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar 'byung // 'khor 'das sa mtshams bag chags gang gis gzung // de yi gdams ngag rnal 'byor gang la
177b2(1): gtad// mnyam pa'i ye shes rgyal pos lung bstan gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// don med nga rgyal dregs pas mkhas 'dod pas// rang gi blta bas ya rabs mtho bzhed
177b3(1): nas// tshig la mnyam sbyor mkhas pa'i zla med kyang // dam tshig phyal por byang chub sems spangs nas// log 'dren khong gsog bden tshig ci smras kyang // 'khrul pa'i sems nyid log 'dren dbang du
177b4(1): 'gyur// gnam lcags mkha' las 'dam du bying ba bzhin// dmyal bar nges 'gro gtan du snying re rje// de yang 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// gsang sngags gsang ba'i lta ba'i sgor zhugs nas// yang
177b5(1): dag rang sems don la ma 'dud par// mi chos zang zing lus ngag las byed pas// ri bos srog chags 'og tu mnan pa ltar// mi shes rang gi nga rgyal bsnyem byed pa// nam yang sangs rgyas byang chub thob mi
177b6(1): srid// de yang sems dpa'i snying po de nyon cig/ rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyi pha bong dkyil skams ltar// theg pa 'og ma'i sde snod chos mnyan kyang // yang dag don gyi lta ba'i gdeng med par// tshig tsam lung las
178a1(1): chos kyi khungs phyung nas// byar med chos la nga rgyal blo brtan nas// lus ngag rtsing chos pad hral spyod byed pas// rang sems bkag kyang 'khor bar mi skyobs te// sdug bsngal ya nga'i 'bras bu the
178a2(1): tshom med// blta ba nyams pa'i skyon du bshad pa'i phyir// shin tu rnal 'byor don nyid rtogs pa gces/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs rgyal po'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor pa'i blta ba nyams pa'i
178a3(1): skyon bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas yang kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyis// rnal 'byor blta ba nyams na skong ba'i thabs// 'dus pa'i tshogs la ched du bka' stsal pa// rang gi
178a4(1): byang chub sems nyid ma rtogs na// ma hA'i yo ga'i chos kyi tshogs mchod phyir// skong bshags phrin las gzhung du byas gyur kyang // rnal 'byor lta ba nyams pa bskang mi 'gyur// de yang sems dpa' rdo rje yid
178a5(1): kyis nyon// bla ma brgyud pa'i gdams ngag don ldan la// rang sems dpang du btsugs nas don zhus nas// rgyun du mi gtong lta ba dran byas nas// snying po mchog gi sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// bde chen thugs la
178a6(1): gsal ba'i dam tshig ste// yan lag dam tshig nyams kyang bsgrib mi nus// rgyun du mi gtong ting 'dzin don bstan na// mtshams med la sogs byas kyang chos kyi sku// 'gyod pa drag po yid byas blta ba ni// mi
178b1(1): brjed gzungs su don la gus pa'i chos// sems la gsal bas rnam rtog ming yang med// skyabs dang mgon du lta ba mchog tu gsungs/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs rgyal po'i rgyud las/ rnal
178b2(1): 'byor pa blta ba nyams na skong ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i snying po 'khor rnams la// kun bzang ston pa chos rjes bka' stsal pa// lta ba nyams pa bskangs
178b3(1): pa'i 'bras bu ni// rang sems sangs rgyas ye shes snying po 'byung // rtogs pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas sa la gnas// 'bras bu gzhan du btsal mi dgos pas mchog/ rang byung gdod nas dag pa'i ngo bo
178b4(1): nyid// chos sku 'gyur ba med pa rang sems don// 'bras bu dus la mi ltos da lta nyid// ye shes dbang thob sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rnam smin lus 'di bral bas kun bzang thugs// byang chub chos nyid
178b5(1): rang byung mthar phyin pas// mi tshe 'di yis byang chub mchog thob nas// rgyu la mi ltos 'bras bu ye shes tshogs// da lta nyid du sems 'di kun tu bzang // lus 'di bral bas sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// skye ba mi
178b6(1): len 'bras bu btsal mi dgos// dngos po lus med snying po byang chub sems// sprin med nam mkhar gza' skar 'char ba bzhin// rang sems rtogs pas 'gro don btsal mi dgos/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye
179a1(1): shes gting rdzogs rgyal po'i rgyud las/ blta ba nyams pa bskangs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas kun rig rgyal pos 'khor rnams la// 'khor 'das sa
179a2(1): mtshams bka' stsal pa// thog mar 'khrul pa'i gzhi gnas bag chags de// gnyid dang 'dod chags 'jigs dang rtogs pa rnams// sngar gyi mngal gyi sgrib g.yogs bag chags brtas// sems dpa' rdo rje
179a3(1): 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// skye bo rang sems ma rtogs par do nas// dper na sprin dang ling tog chu bur mig/ rdzas rnams mi mthong bsgribs pa'i mun pa bzhin// ma rig dbang gis bsgribs pa'i bag chags
179a4(1): kyis// rang la yod pa'i chos sku don chen bsgribs// de tshe sngon gyi rdzas rnams rjes dran nas// gos dang gnyen 'dun dran pa byung nas kyang // nga nyid nges par shi'am gar 'gro ba'i// sgrib g.yogs lus kyi chu
179a5(1): bur dmigs pa'i phyir// dper na mig phyung bzhin du bag chags blos// dug lnga las la kun spyod yid dran 'gyur// shes rab lta ba'i mig med gti mug blos// mi shes byed pa med phyir 'dus byas kyi// dge
179a6(1): ba lus ngag yid kyis ci spyad kyang // phan pa rdul tsam mi nus don med 'khyams// de tshe gzugs bral yid kyi dbang po ni// kun tshang thogs med 'gro ba'i phyir na 'khrul// dper na 'dab chags mkha' la 'gro/
179b1(1): yang ni// 'dod pa'i dbang gis sa khung rnyi yis 'dzin// de bzhin gzung 'dzin dbang gis lus su 'jug/ de tshe gcig gis tha dad gang len pa// char sogs sdug bsngal nyid gyur skyabs tshol bas// gzhal
179b2(1): yas rtswa yi spyil skyibs nang dag tu// rang dbang med par shugs kyis chud pa snyam// pho mo 'du 'phrod rkyen gyis mngal du 'jug/ rnam bzhi gang rung las kyis skye ba'i phyir// mthon dman las la 'dam pa'i
179b3(1): dbang med pa// de yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams da nyon cig/ mtha' mi'i rnal 'byor blta ba rtogs pa yi// gdams ngag skal med bsam gtan zhi gnas kyis// ye shes bag chags mnyam nyid ting 'dzin
179b4(1): gyis// rdzogs pa tha ma nyams su myong ba'i phyir// 'dod chags lha mi gar skyes rang dbang yod// rtogs pa 'bring gi rnal 'byor blta ba ni// dran pa ma yengs tsam du don gsal na// rnam rtog chags pa de nyid
179b5(1): zil gyis gnon// dper na mi gang rtsal ldan de shugs kyis// rtsal med non bzhin rjes su gsal bas na// dper na khyung sgong nang nas bya bton bzhin// rnam smin lus dang bral nas don dran te// gtsang ma
179b6(1): ris kyi lhar ni skyes nas kyang // mngon par 'bras bu sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung // de yang sems dpa' rdo rje snying po nyon// rtogs pa rab kyi blo dngos gcig pa'i phyir// lta ba'i rgyun la yengs pa mi 'byung
180a1(1): phyir// lus kyi sgrib g.yogs bral ba'i skad cig la// 'bras bu sangs rgyas rgyal po chos kyi sku// dpe med kun bzang ye shes thugs kyi thugs// nam mkha'i mthongs su nyi shar mun pa med// de
180a2(1): bzhin rnal 'byor lus bral sems nyid la// ma rig med par chos nyid gsal ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas ye shes thugs la 'char nub med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba ye shes gting rdzogs kyi rgyud las/ 'khor
180a3(1): 'das gnyis kyis mtshams bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas yang kun rig rgyal pos don bstan pa// theg pa'i rgyal po chos nyid lhun rdzogs 'di// skal dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams khyed

180b3(1): rje sems dpa' snying po nyon// rnal 'byor gang zhig snod ldan chos// gzhung bzhin don las mi 'da' dad pa can// dka' dgu bsngos nas man ngag chud 'di tshol// de tshe rnal 'byor las can don gyi phyir//

181a1(1): bsnams nas byon pa'i chos gser gyi dril shing can rdzogs so// // @#// rgya gar skad du// badz+ra satwany+dza ka sha bi pra la guh+ya gar+b+ha pra kret+yar+tha tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems

181a3(1): shes lhun gyis grub pa/ rang byung rig pa'i rgyal po// 'od gsal thig le bde ba chen po de/ rig pa 'pho 'gyur med pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / khams gsum gyi sems can dang /
181a4(1): lam la rjes su lta ba rnams 'byed pa mi mnga' bar thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa'i rgyal po la// rig pa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma'o dgongs pa rnams
181a5(1): kyi gsang // stong nyid zhi ba thugs rje'i ngang // snying po'i snying po don gyi mchog/ rdzogs chen don 'di legs par gsungs// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa'i rgyal po des// btsal du med
181a6(1): pa thig le chen po'i don 'di gsungs pa/ rang byung gsang ba thig le'i ngang // chos kun 'dus pa lus pa med// 'grod med rtsol bral lhun gyis grub// sbyangs thob ma yin rdzogs pa'i klong // rig pa'i rgyal po
181b1(1): kun gsal ba// 'dod pa'i don kun rdzogs pa'i bdag/ ye shes rgya mtsho rnam grol lam// theg pa kun rdzogs mkha' ltar yangs// rang rig legs pa'i snying po nyid// kun gyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings// sgo
181b2(1): 'dogs skur 'debs kun gyis stongs// gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med// theg pa gcig la kun rdzogs pas// ye shes dri med rnam par dag/ rang byung thig le nyi ma shar// khyab pa chen po chos kyi sku// stong
181b3(1): pa chen po rig pa'i rgya// ye nas dag pas 'da' ba med// ye shes gsang ba byang chub sems// nam mkha' chen po gcig pu nyid// thig le chen po ye bstan pas// spro bsdu med pa'i dbyings la gnas// sgro skur
181b4(1): dmigs pa'i yul med pas// rang rig gsal ba dbus mtha' med// kun gyi rang bzhin gsang ba'i phyir// rtog dpyod 'dzin pa'i yul gyis stongs// ma yengs rig pa mnyam gnas pa// ting 'dzin 'khor lo/
181b5(1): bstan mi dgos// rang byung dgongs par kun rdzogs pas// ma btsal lhun grub rang las byung // phyag rgya chen po bdag gnas phyir// ma bsgoms 'da' ba med pa'i ngang // dngos bral rig pa'i phyag rgya
181b6(1): 'di// ye shes snying por 'od 'bar ba// kun gyi snying por bdag gnas pas// 'di nyid rang bzhin gting dpag dka'// thig gcig snying po rdzogs pa la// chos kun rdzogs te ngo bor gnas// don kun yongs
182a1(1): rdzogs thig le la// rang bzhin gnas pas rim pa med// snying po rig pa don gyi rgyud// de rgyud theg pa'i yang snying 'di// ye shes phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i mchog/ mi 'da' de nyid kho na'i don// 'du
182a2(1): shes sbyor ba ma lus zad// rgyu med sems la rkyen bral bas// skye 'jig 'gyur ba ga la yod// ye nas zin pas bya ba med// lhun gyis rdzogs pas bsam pa med// rang la rdzogs pas bsgrub tu
182a3(1): med// dmigs med don la bsgom du med// dus gcig rdzogs pas bgrod du med// ye shes rig pa'i phyag rgya la// rnam grol 'bras bu kun rdzogs ldan// gsang ba rang byung rig pa'i sgra// brjod pa ma yin
182a4(1): don gyis shes// 'di ltar gcig tu gnas pa la// tha dad mthong ba 'khrul pa'i lam// snying po sems nyid rdzogs pa la// dran dang dbang po yid byed med// lus dang ngag sems rtsal gnas med// ci bder
182a5(1): gnas pa dgag bsgrub med// ces gsungs so// snying po rnal ma don gyi rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsol med rig pa'i rgyal pos/ ldan
182a6(1): gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// ma btsal lhun grub ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// ma rtsol ma byas ye nas ji bzhin nyid// rang byung gsang ba'i dbyings 'di
182b1(1): brjod bral te// mtshon dang brtags shing dpyad pa'i yul las 'das// dus gsum rnam dag rig pa dbyer med pas// rig pa dbyer med gcig tu lhun gyis rdzogs// ma bsags ma sbyangs ye sangs rgyas pa'i
182b2(1): klong / mtha' bral rig pa'i klong la bsam zhing brjod du med// ye nas kun rdzogs bdag nyid lhun rdzogs pa// sa la mi bgrod lam la mi sbyang zhing // ma rtogs ting 'dzin sbyang ba sgyu ma'i nad// ma btsal rang
182b3(1): bzhin bzhag pas grub pa yin// ma yengs klong du zhugs na bsgom pa yin// rig pa gcig la rdzogs pas 'dus pa yin// rang bzhin 'da' ba med pas dam tshig yin// ma rtsol lhun gyis grub pa 'bras bu
182b4(1): yin// gnyis med ngang la gnyis bzung thig le bsgribs// thig le gcig la gnyis 'dzin rtog pas bcings// bden pa gcig la nor ba'i lung gis brtags// bsam med gcig la log rtog drang bas
182b5(1): bsam// rang byung don la rgyu dang rkyen du tshogs// bltar med don la log mthong stobs kyis bltas// bgrod med lam la rnam rtog zhen pas bgrod// gzung med mnyam nyid phyin ci log tu bzung // ma dag
182b6(1): dag par bltas pas dag pa rnyog mar langs// rnam rtog phyag rgyas bcings pas ye shes phyag rgya bshig/ ma brjod ye shes gsung mchog brjod pas nyams// mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pas ye shes
183a1(1): dkyil 'khor spangs// btang snyoms stong nyid bsgoms pas bde mchog phyag rgya dral// mtshan ma tshig la zhen pas mtha' yi lta bar lhung // gang yang mi 'byed bde mchog dbyings la rol// snying
183a2(1): po'i snying po rig pa'i ye shes nyid// don gyi don te kun don sems la thug/ rgyud kyi rgyud de kun 'brel rang bzhin rdzogs// bya bral rdzogs lung bde mchog phyag rgyas gdab// ye nas mi 'da' lhun gyis grub
183a3(1): par gsal// rang byung gcig la bltas dgur rang snang ba// rnam pa lhun grub rol pa ngo mtshar che// rang bzhin gcig la yon tan kun tshang bas// ma btsal bzhag pas yon tan rang bzhin rdzogs// ma
183a4(1): bsags lhun grub rang byung 'bras bu la// rag las ma yin gdod nas lhun rdzogs yin// sbyangs thob ma yin dag pa brda' phrad yin// dmigs bral 'di nyid mkha' ltar khyab par gnas// bsam med brjod
183a5(1): bral chos dbyings sgra// brjod pas rig pa'i ye shes rnyed mi 'gyur// ma btsal rang bzhag bde chen rgyas thebs na// thams cad ye shes bde mchog phyag rgyar gsal// stong min mi stong ma yin dbu ma
183a6(1): min// gang yin de yin bdag gzhan gang yang min// bsam pa kun zad sbyor ba'i 'du shes med// stong zhing rang gsal rang rig bde mchog dbyings// rgya gsum dbyings la thebs pas 'da' mi srid// sku
183b1(1): gsum dbyings la brda' phrad 'bral du med// ma rnyogs dngas mar gsal bas sgrib pa med// ma yengs rang bzhin gsal bas sangs rgyas yin// yengs med 'khor los sgrib pa rnam par gcod// rnyog dang ma
183b2(1): rnyog rtog pas ma rnyog ste// ma rnyog rnyog dus bzhi yis mi phye la// dus tshod nges 'dzin bde mchog gdams ngag bzhin// rnyog dang ma rnyog gnyis ka bsal gyur na// dam pa'i dgongs pa lhun gyis grub nges
183b3(1): pas// rnyog ma bsal zhing dngas ma blang du med// sdig gsum bde bar gcig pas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa med// lhun grub nyams su myong bas 'bras bu re dogs med// rig pa'i cho 'phrul nyid la rtsol bsgrub
183b4(1): bya mi dgos// zhes gsungs so// snying po don gyi rgyud las/ ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i lung phog pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po des/ thams cad gtan
183b5(1): la phebs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa 'di skad gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rang sems rdzogs pas rang bzhin gsal// sgra dang tshad ma gtan tshigs kyis// brjod bral gtan la phebs
183b6(1): pa med// ma bcos rig pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// ma brjod don gyi ngo bo mtshon// chu yi rang bzhin gsher ba ltar// rig pa nyams su shes par bya// ji bzhin rtogs pa'i nyams med na// tshig gi brda' tshig
