344b6(1): srong // de dag la ni 'dun pa med// dam tshig spre'u ltar spyod bzhin du// byang chub snying po thob pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // 'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong // rgyal ba'i sras gyur rnal 'byor
345a1(1): pa// lam ston skyon sel mkhas pa la// kha cig dregs dang phrag dog gis// khro spong zabs kyis smod par byed// de ni 'khor ba'i gting rdo ste// nams kyang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung // mi shes pa yi
345a2(1): rnal 'byor pa/ yang dag don dang ldan pa'i mi// rjes su 'gro bar mi byed cing // longs spyod 'du 'dzi gang ldan pa'i// rjes su 'gro zhing de la 'dud// de ni log pa'i lam pa yin// rnal 'byor ltar dang byang
345a3(1): chub khe// 'ban thag chad par blo mi 'byung // zang zing nor dang g.yo sbrul khe// chung yang cis 'grub srog dang sngo// rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can// bum snod nang gi gsal ba ltar// shes rab mdzod
345a4(1): kyi gter ldan yang // srog chags rkun mo'i sder mo ltar// khong nas gab sbas don ston la// blun po rnams kyis cir mi mthong // dper na 'di 'drar tshul gcig ste// lus la gter 'chag mi dang ni// blun
345a5(1): por gyur pa'i mi dag gnas// 'grogs kyang gnyis mtshungs khyad par 'dra// ting 'dzin bsngags pa rjod byed cing // ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba med// yang dag bsngags pa rjod byed cing // yang dag don du
345a6(1): gnyer ba med// dam tshig bsngags pa rjod byed cing // dam tshig don du gnyer ba med// ji ltar 'gro gang la la dag/ nor bu rin chen 'di 'dra ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan kun 'byung zhes// rin chen dag gi yon
345b1(1): tan brjod// de la 'gro gang gzhan dag gis// de ltar 'dod pa 'byung gyur na// de ltar cung zad yod dam zhes/ dris kyang med pas slar smras pa// gang zhig dgos pa skong ba yi// yon tan cung zad smos pa
345b2(1): zad// de nyid bdag la med ces smra// de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pas// bslab par bya ba'i chos bral la// chos nyid bsngags pa rjod byed kyang // de dag la ni chos nyid med// de las spyod pa'i log spyod
345b3(1): rnams// dam tshig can gyis spang bar bya// rnal 'byor chos 'dzin gang dag gis// rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur log sreg can// gsang ba 'jig pa'i dgrar mthong nas// de dag sdig pa mthong ba ltar// skrod cing
345b4(1): chad pas gcod byed pa// skyes bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras// dper na blon po gang dag gis// nyes byas khrims dang 'gal 'gyur na// 'gal bar mi gtong khrims dang sbyor// bka' yi yo srong blon po de// rgyal
345b5(1): po'i thugs 'dzin dam pa zhes// kun du rgya cher grags par 'gyur// ldum rar dug gi sdong skyes na// bdag pos dug tu shes ma zag/ rtsad nas phyung ste med par byed// ci phyir ldum zas de dag las// dug
345b6(1): 'phel gyur na 'chi phyir ro// de bzhin nyams 'gyur dug can de// brtul zhugs can gyi rnal 'byor des// gnas sam lo yis spyugs te spang // gang dag mi spong mgon byed pa/ de dag gsang ba'i dam sri
346a1(1): yin// don la rnam 'byor gang zhig gis// tha tshig zab mor bcas rnams las// bsrung ba'i bsam pa mi g.yo bzhin// rtsa ba yan lag bcas rnams la// gal te ma tshor zhig gyur kyang // rnam
346a2(1): smin yod kyang rtsa mi nyams// ji ltar glang po e ne ya// shi nas ro ru gyur mod kyang // gi wang rtsid ni don byed ltar// rnal 'byor nyams de ror gyur yang // gzhan gyis bkur ba'i gnas yin zhing // de yi don
346a3(1): byed nus pa yin// de ltar mod kyang 'di kun rnams// rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya// ci phyir 'o ma nyung ngu zhig/ rul bas 'o ma kun rul bzhin// rnal 'byor nyams gyur gcig gis ni// rnal 'byor can kun ma
346a4(1): rung 'gyur// 'khor ba'i g.yul rgyal byed pa yi// log pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad kun// don la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thams cad bsgrims te spang bar bya// gal te ma spangs log spyad na// 'khor
346a5(1): ba'i g.yul ni rgyal 'gyur te// bden pa'i byin brlabs mthu chung 'gyur// kun kyang dge spyang don chung zhes// yang dag don las yid byung zhing // log pa'i chos la spro bar byed// kun kyang log pa'i las spyad
346a6(1): pas// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung // des ni sgro skur gnyis su 'gyur// bka' yi chad pa gang yin pa// ye shes can lta rang bzhin gyis// nams kyang gnod pa yong mi mdzad// de yi 'khor na gnas pa
346b1(1): yi// gang dag ma rungs mthu chen rnams// rnal 'byor log par spyod rnams kyi// skyon mthong tsam na chad pas bcod// thams cad ngan 'gror spyi'u tshugs ltung // grub pa'i snod mchog gcig yod de// 'di dang
346b2(1): mi mthun kun rdzogs pa'i// rgyud mnyan don ldan ngang tshul bzang / ci la chags med gtor ldan sems// shes rab rnam grol lde mig gis// gti mug thar ma blo phye nas// chos kyi snying po'i mig ldan
346b3(1): pas// rtag chad phrad mthong dbu ma'i yul// ma nor lam du 'jug shes pas// sdong po sdong chen rab dul ba'o// tha tshig lung las byung ba bzhin// gzhung srong thub par byed pa de// rgyal ba'i sras po yin pas
346b4(1): na// de la gsang sgro dbye bar bya// ji ltar dam tshig thub par ltar// de bzhin yid bzhin nor bu ste// yid 'ong 'dod dang bde ba 'byung / rigs 'dzin rgyal ba kun yum mo// de bzhin dam tshig thub pa
346b5(1): ltar// gnas par byed pa'i rten yang yin// dam tshig kun gyi srog yin te// dam tshig kun gyi nor mchog go/ dam tshig 'di ni 'jigs pa'i skyabs// dam tshig bgrod pa lam gyi mchog/ dam tshig chu bo grol
346b6(1): ba'i gru// dam tshig dngos grub dam pa yin// dam tshig grogs kyi mchog yin te// dam tshig long ba'i mig bu yin// ji ltar dam tshig thub par ltar// gzhan gyi sde pa 'joms pa yin// 'khor ba'i g.yul las
347a1(1): rgyal bar byed// des na dam tshig rgyun bzhin bsrung // mdor na bdag gi sgo gsum po// dag pa gsum gyi mtha' bzung nas// lha dang grogs dang slob dpon dang / bdag nyid dag pa ma khrel
347a2(1): ba'i// tshul gsum mi gnod dam bcas gsum// yongs su ma nyams mdo bzhi po// mthar phyir rgya rtags rnam bzhir bcas// mdo don dran pa la bgrang bsngo// brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dam tshig ni// dam tshig
347a3(1): na gyi thog mar 'gro// wa dang cang shes gyi ling dang // blang dor ming bral khor chen bdag/ shin tu glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// dpal rtul stag mchog rngam zhing tum// mkha' lding khyung chen lhag mi
347a4(1): lta// gtum thung don chen sdong gcig pa// yid thub mi ldog rgya mtsho'i gser// gti mug lkugs pa'i blo tshor ldan// ri bo mi 'gyur brtan pa che// mkha' ltar yangs dog kun dang bral// gnas lcags lce yi drag
347a5(1): shul can// phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs bdag/ zon bag khu 'phrig kha rog sems/ nges pa'i nga rgyal glang tshul ldan/ bla bral seng ge ri dwags rgyal/ ri 'jam bya ltar chags 'grogs blo/ g.yo ldan lcag chen spu
347a6(1): ma'i rgya/ gtsang sme med par kun spyod cing // thogs med gso sbyong ce spyad khwa// che ba'i nga rgyal stag mchog blo// kum 'dzem blo ldan nam mkha' lding // sa thub bag len rgyal 'khor skyong // rnal 'byor brtul
347b1(1): zhugs chen po ni// bcu gnyis dang ni gsum blor ldan// goms nas nyams su len byed pa// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i bka' ba yin// dal ba'i rgyud ldan tha tshig can// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// bsrung
347b2(1): dang brjod dang gsang ba dang // yan lag spyad pa'i dam tshig dang // yid 'ong dang du blang ba dang // brtul zhugs zab mor spyad pa dang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thams cad kyi/ mi 'dor mi spong sbyar ba
347b3(1): yi// rig ldan shes par bya ba dang // thob cing grub par bya ba yin// re re la yang lnga lnga ste// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag las// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad ldan pa// spyad par bya ba'i nor mchog yin// rnal 'byor
347b4(1): byang chub sems rgyud la/ nges par brtags te spyod pa'i bu// zab mor rdzogs mchog bde ba yi// blo la nges pa'i lung 'di bstan// 'di ni sngar 'gro tha tshig ste// zab mo sgrub pa'i sngon logs su// rdo rje tha tshig
347b5(1): drag po'o// gcan 'phrang lam rnams bsrung ba'i phyir// spyi dang khyad par dam tshig rnams// nges pa'i don gyis bsrung byas nas// de ni dbyig gi snod chen yin// de ltar spyi yi sdom pa la// gnas nas dus kyi
347b6(1): skabs 'di ru// bsrung bya thub par bya ba ni// mi shigs pa ni seng ge ste// gcan gzan rgyal po yin pas so// za ma tog ni 'dod pa'i gter// dug spyo ba ni der mi rigs// rin chen myu gu'i lcug phran dag/ de
348a1(1): ni breg pa'i rigs ma yin// gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma dag/ mkhas pas btung bar bya ba min// pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru kha ma bye// zla zer ma yin kha mi dbye// ma brtags bug rdol can gyi snod// kha
348a2(1): mi dbye zhing bcud mi blugs// don dang mi ldan bcos ma'i rtags// bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min// shel dkar rin che sgo nga dag/ 'dam rdzab khung du bsrub mi bya// seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag/ dug can
348a3(1): snod du blugs pa min// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// bsreg par bya ba yod ma yin// khyung chen gshog pa mkhar brkyang ba// de dag gcag par bya ba min// gnam lcags me yi ngur mo dag/ brdab par bya ba
348a4(1): ma yin no// stegs gzigs 'drol bas las byas pa'i// las kyi lhag ma bsdu mi bya// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i gzhi// de dag gzhig par bya ba min// rdo rje ra ba'i go tshags ni// bsdam bya bral bar bya ba
348a5(1): min// bud shing sreg pa'i sgron ma dag/ g.yeng ba'i rlung gis bskyod mi bya// rdo rje tshig gi chu rgun dag/ 'ol kar gcad par bya bar min// rgyal po'i bka' rtags phyag rgya dag/ nam zhar dbyi bar mi bya'o//
348a6(1): rje pha lam gtams pa'i mkhar// rmang nas bzlog par mi bya'o// gtsugs gi nor bu 'bar ba dag/ rgyal mtshan rtse las dpon mi bya// rnal 'byor las kyi phyed par can// skal can rnams kyi dam tshig ste// skal
348b1(1): bar ldan pa'i nor mchog yin// rgyun du spyad pa'i nor mchog ni// rdo rje las kyi thun tshags dag/ rdo rje go phur trom chen gyis// srog la bar chad byed pa'i dgra// nyon mongs 'thibs pa de gzhom bya// snyoms
348b2(1): las le lo'i dpung bskyed pa// zug thub rachod nga rgyal gzhi// dregs byed dbang po myos pa'i bcud// dpa' byed rkyen yangs bsdam par bya// rdo rje gsang tshig ma gtogs pa// 'dres pa gang zag byis pa'i
348b3(1): tshig/ zur yang brjod par mi bya zhing // thams cad rdo rje gsang bas bya'o// ji ltar gsod pa'i mi rnams dag/ gshed ma'i mis ni gsod pa'i tshe// thar pa'i thabs la brtson pa bzhin// le lo'i dgra bcom
348b4(1): brtsom par 'bad// rnal 'byor sgrib pa'i gegs bsal ba// dka' thub sdom pa'i mdud pa can// 'dod dang longs spyod mi mthun dang // spyi mthun nang du mi gcig pa// phyi nang can dang gnod byed
348b5(1): dang // 'dod myos bying rmugs brkam pa dang // dad med rtsa nyams 'phyar g.yeng can// mkhas pas bsgrims te spang bar bya'o// de ni rnal 'byor gegs yin te// dngos grub chu bo gcod par byed// rnal 'byor
348b6(1): nges par spyod pa la// bar du gcod pa'i bdud lnga 'byung // rnam rtog 'phrig pa'i bdud nyid dang // de bzhin btang snyoms le lo'i bdud// longs spyod 'du 'dzin g.yeng ba'i bdud// tshig rtsub mtshon cha rnon
349a1(1): po'i bdud/ khro gtum ngag thung 'khrug pa'i bdud// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bdud lnga po// yang dag don la sgrib pa ste// gnyen po byang chub sems mchog gis// zhi ba chen po'i ngang du bzlog/ rnal
349a2(1): 'byor spyod pa'i dgra bzhi po// thabs la mkhas pas gdul bar bya// rdo rje brnag pa gsang 'phel bas// ngag gi dbang po nyams 'gyur te// kha na ma thos phog par 'gyur// de dag bcas kar 'gyur ba'i dgra//
349a3(1): ltalha dman spyod rtsing 'chol ba yis// bka' yi gzhung bor logs par spyad// nor bas bar chad 'byung ba'i dgra/ dam gtsor spyod pa'i las rnams yin// 'da' dka' rdo rje mchog gsum po// btang snyoms phyal
349a4(1): bar shor ba ni// rtsa ba rul pa'i ljon shing bzhin// bka' chad chen po 'bab pa'i gnas// brtsam pa las la sbyor ba'i tshe// 'bad pa'i rtsal shugs chung ba yis// don rnams grub pa ma yin te// 'bras bur mi
349a5(1): 'gyur 'phro ba'i dgra// rnal 'byor chen por spyod pa la/ 'dod pa'i nor mchog 'phrog pa'i dgra// thabs la mkhas pa'i skyes bu yis// skyon gyi dgra bzhi spang bar bya// srid gsum bsgral ba'i zhing 'di
349a6(1): dag/ sangs rgyas zhing du rtog pa ni// sa rnams cig car sbyangs pa ste// zhing rnams dag pa'i mchog yin no// khams gsum mchod pa'i rgyu 'di dag/ yo byed chen po'i mchog yin te// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes
349b1(1): pa'i rgyu// rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'o// 'khor ba dur khrod gnas 'di dag/ bde ba chen po'i gnas yin te// ma nor ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// btsal med lhun gyis grub pa la// dug lnga rgyu ba'i rtsa ba
349b2(1): dag/ ye shes lnga yi rtsa ba ste// kun shes kun rig gsal ba'o// rang rig ye shes rang las byung // rnal 'byor chos mig ldan pa yis// nges pa'i don du 'di ltar blta'o// 'di ni rgyun gyi dam tshig ste// brjod
349b3(1): du med pa bsrung ba'o// bsrung ba thub par bya ba la/ dam tshig rtsal gyi khyad par ni// gang dag rig pa 'dzin pa yi// blo la nges pa'i lung du bstan// 'dod pas chags dang 'joms pa dang // gti mug nga rgyal
349b4(1): phrag dog rnams// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig ste// don dang ldan pa'i skyes bus smra// sbyor dang sgrol bar byed pa dang // ma byin len dang ngag sprul byed// rnal 'byor dam tshig spyod pa'i mchog/ spyad par bya/
349b5(1): ba'i las yin no// rgyal ba sems can thams cad dang // dngos por brtags pa thams cad kyang // don gyi ngang du gcig pa ste// de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ mtshan ma'i chos rnams thams cad
349b6(1): ni// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du gsal// theg pa 'og ma'i khyad par rnams// kun kyang rang rig blo la gsal// yon tan ci 'byung mi brjod cing // 'og ma rnams la mi smod cing // thams cad mnyam pa'i dam
350a1(1): tshig ste// 'di ltar shes na tshogs mchog rdzogs// gzugs rnams rnam par ba snang ba mdzad// tshig rnams brjod pa snang mtha' yas// rnam rtog kun du sems rdo rje// rig dang tshor ba rin chen
350a2(1): 'byung // yid g.yo byed pa don kun rdzogs// stan 'gan rang bzhin spyod pa'i gnas// zhing bcu dag dang ldan pa na// bde ba chen po'i longs spyod de// thogs med phrin las rnam bzhir rdzogs// phyi yi yul dang
350a3(1): nang gi sems// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gnas// de la sgrib dang mi sgrib ces// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yod gsungs// thams cad mnyam nyid dbyings gyur pas// phung po lnga don ye shes lnga// sku
350a4(1): gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug ni// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yin// yul dang ye shes rang bzhin las// gzhan gyi rang bzhin med pas na// mtshan ma'i rnam pa cir snang yang // de la chad pa'i gnas med
350a5(1): do// dam tshig dam pa gang zhe na// rtogs pa dam pa dam tshig ste// rtog par byed pa gang yin pa// de ni dam tshig chen po'o// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul las// dngos
350a6(1): su spyod pa thams cad bya// de ni dam tshig chen po yin// snod du gyur pa yum gyi dbyings// bcud rnams rgyal ba yab kyi mkha'// 'byung 'jug rig pas longs spyod de// 'di ni rdo rje tha tshig yin// srid pa'i
350b1(1): sems can thams cad dang // thar pa chos kyi rnam grangs kun// so sor thams cad snang bar ste// kun kyang mnyam pa'i ngag du gsal// spyod pa'i las dang rtogs pa dang / mtshan mar gyur pa thams cad
350b2(1): kyang // sems kyi phyi nang spyod yul de// brtags na longs spyod tshogs su 'gyur// ma skyes stong pa'i sku yi rgya// rang bzhin smon med gsung gi don// mtshan med yid las 'das pa'i thugs// rnam gsum bde
350b3(1): chen sangs rgyas so// mnyam pa'i lta bas dbang sgyur na// 'khor ba thams cad dbyings la snang // las kun rdzogs pa'i mchog yin te// gzhan du phrin las lus pa med// sdug bsngal byang chub chen po
350b4(1): ste// 'khor ba ye nas myang ngan 'das// sgrib pa rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// nyon mongs kun kyang byang chub don// snang ba med pa'i don mthong dang // sa dang sa yi rim par ni// 'di dang 'di zhes gzung du
350b5(1): med// 'di ni snang med thob pa'i gnas// sku dang gsung thugs mi g.yo ba'i// ji bzhin nyid kyi ngapal gnas// ji ltar bskur yang chos nyid pas// chad pa'i gnas zhes brjod dang bral// med dang phyal ba
350b6(1): gcig po dang // lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dam tshig che// 'di zhes ris su chad med pa// 'di ni bsrung ba'i dam tshig go/ skud dang spyod par bya med pas/ srid dang mu stegs 'jig rten pa'i// spyod par snang
351a1(1): pa thams cad kun// lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad spyod do// ma spangs lhun grub dbyer med pas/ dbyings las gzhan na lha yul med// 'di ni lta ba'i dam tshig go/ sa chu me rlung snod bcud
351a2(1): bcas// kun kyang rang bzhin chos nyid do// chos nyid don la gzhan med pa// rang byung ye shes gsal ba'o// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// ma btsal rang la yod pa yin/ 'dod pa 'byung ba'i longs spyod
351a3(1): de// bde chen longs spyod tshogs yin no// ngan song mtho ris thams cad dang // 'phags lam 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun// rang bzhin so sor mi dmigs te// sangs rgyas kyi ni rang bzhin yin// spyod dang
351a4(1): gzugs rigs thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin te// sku gsung thugs tshig rgya cher ston// don rigs thugs kyi rang bzhin no// ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba// mi gnas pa la chags pa med// don gyi
351a5(1): khyad par rtogs chud na// kun tu bzang po mchog gi sa'o// mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzogs te// thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi don// bdag nyid chen por thams cad rdzogs// lhan rdzogs bde ba chen po yi//
351a6(1): khyab pa chen por kun bdal bas// sgrib pa kun byang tshogs kun rdzogs// rnam grol bcings pa kun dang bral// lhun grub bde ba'i gnas chen yin// zhes smra ba'i seng ge chen pos gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal
351b1(1): po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las ma tshig gsang ba mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad brdas mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
351b2(1): la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad ni bdag cag rnams kyis brda rig pa tsam gyi ngo
351b3(1): bor mthong ngo // de nas sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni brda dang / tha snyad dang / btags pa tsam du shes par gyis shig btags pa'i chos thams cad ni phyi
351b4(1): nang gang na yang mi gnas te/ chos thams cad la ming gi gzhi med cing btags pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba yin no// brda zhes bya ba ni sbas pa btags pa'i tha snyad yin no// sbas pa'i chos rnams gsang ba'i
351b5(1): phyir/ thams cad snga zhing brgyud par bya/ 'di ltar brda yi sbyor ba la/ rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis/ de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen pos brda yi chos rnams rgya
351b6(1): cher bshad du gsol/ bdag cag gis kyang chos thams cad// brda yi don gyis brgyud par bgyi// brda zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// sbas pa'i chos ni gang dang gang // mi bstan gsang ba gang gang lags// de skad
352a1(1): ces gsol pa dang // smra ba'i seng ges bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// brda zhes bya ba sbas pa'i tshig/ sbas te gsang ba'i chos rnams ni// rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa yin//
352a2(1): mi bstan gzhan la gsang ba ni// mu stegs la sogs sde pa rnams// rnal 'byor spyod la 'phya ba las// shin tu bla na zhing sba ba'i phyir// sbas pa'i brda yis bstan par bya// brda yi yon tan chen po ni// grangs
352a3(1): kyang bsam gyi mi khyab na// mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi yod de// gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin dang // rnal 'byor rig pa'i spyod yul dang // sbas pas grub thag nye ba dang // gsang ba'i dam tshig mi nyams
352a4(1): shing // brda la dga' ba'i ma sring rnams// nye zhing gdung pa'i thabs su 'gyur// de bas sbas pa'i brda rnams ni// tshig gis mtshon te brjod par bya// a la la hoH/ a ti pu hoH/ pra ti po ho/ ma hA go ru saM kra
352a5(1): ma/ gu ya de bI sa ma ya/ ma hA tsan+da/ ma hA puR+sha/ gu ya/ b+ha ga/ ma hA badz+ra/ sa ma ya hoH/ sa ma ya staM/ ra ho ya haMHra ga yA mi/ sa ma ya dzaH/ lhan/ oM AMHhUMHsa ma ya/ sa ma ya/ e h+ye hiHe h+ye hi/ ha he ha/
352a6(1): ha he ha/ ma taM kha/ ma taM kha/ ka ruk+Sha/ ka ruk+Sha/ k+ShaM ba ri/ k+ShaM ba ri/ ra ho haM ra ho haM/ sa ma ya hi/ a la staM/ a la staM/ kha kha le kha le/ sha da pa/ sha da pa/ kha raM khA hi/ kha raM khA hi/ kha le b+h+yo/ kha le ha b+h+yo/ kha ka kha
352b1(1): kha ka kha/ kha hi ha he/ rak+Sha khA hi rak+Sha khA hi/ ha ha he raM/ gu h+ya/ gu h+ya/ sa ma/ sa ma/ ma le mu le/ ta le du le/ ma tsa me tsa/ gu h+ya sit+ti/ pa ra ma/ pa ra ma/ shi ri hoH/ shi ri ho/ ma ma kha ka traM/ e e e e/ hri hri/
352b2(1): b+h+yo b+h+yo/ kha kha le le/ karma ma ti b+h+yo/ rak+Sha kra ti b+h+yo/ rak+Sha kra ma b+h+yo/ karma ma le/ karma ma le/ k+Sh+ya ti sha ne/ k+Sh+ya ti sha ne/ rak+Sha karma/ rak+Sha karma/ kro d+ha k+ShaM/ kha hi b+h+yo khA hi b+h+yo/ tsa le yaM/ tsa le yaM/ pra tsa le/ pra tsa le/
352b3(1): guR+Ya yaM/ guR+Ya yaM/ bi gur+t+ti/ bi gun+ti/ ma mo& haM/ ma mo ny+dza haM/ ngag brda dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// byA g+h+ri tsaR+Ya/ byA g+h+ri tsaR+Ya/ ba yaM k+ShaM ga ri/ ba yaM k+ShaM ga ri/ ba byA dz+nyo ba ba ti/ ba byA dz+nyo ba ba ti/ na ra ha sa/ na ra ha sa/
352b4(1): ban+na ka pA la/ ban+na ka pA la/ tsaR+Ya na ga tAM/ tsaR+Ya[:]na ga tAM/ rA ga rak+ta tsa rA ga rak+ta tsa/ ru d+hi ra ma ta/ ru d+hi ra ma ta/ ka ru ga tsa/ ka ru ga tsa/ pa bya ba ti/ ba bya ba ti/ gaM gro Na/ gaM gro Na/ thaR+Ya ta/ thaR+Ya ta/
352b5(1): dpa' byed kha/ dpa' byed kha/ zla ba rgyas dang rdzogs pa dang // zla ba dkar dang zla phrom mchog/ tshe 'dzin kun gyi gtso mo dang // 'jam po thar pa chen po dang / gal zhes bya ba'i ro mchog dang / gzi brjid chen
352b6(1): po'i dri zhim dang // bran mo dang ni g.yog 'chang ma/ 'jam dpal rnon po'i ka tar dang / mA tha ya mA tha ya/ paR+Ya ti paR+Ya rA ti/ rA tha ma rA tha ma kha taM nya kha taM nya/ rA ti hUM rA ti hUM/ shi haM tha/ shi haM tha/ ka raM tha/ ka
353a1(1): raM tha/ shak+ti kha shak+ti kha/ yo ga tsargan yo ga tsarban/ sgra brda dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// lag gi phyag rgya chen po ni// gar zabs g.yas g.yon bskor nas kyang // se gol brdabs pa 'dren pa'i
353a2(1): brda// bskor nas thal sbyar rgya'i brda// shin tu bskor nas spyi bor grol// 'di ni mchod pa bzhes pa'i brda// bsko nas snying gar bcangs pa ni// ting 'dzin rdo rje brtan pa'i brda// gar bskor shin tu gnyis
353a3(1): stabs pa// mchod pa stobs par byed pa'i brda// gar bskor dbang mo'i spyir bor bzhag/ sbyor ba'i don la 'jug pa'i brda// thabs kyis spyi bor bzhag pa dang // shes rab dbang mo'i snying gar ro// thabs
353a4(1): kyis gsang ba g.yas bcug na// shes rab zos byed gsang ba yin// thabs kyis na sa g.yas bteg na// shes rab na sa g.yon bteg pa'o// thabs kyis rdo rje phyag rgya bstan// shes rab pad+mo'i phyag rgya
353a5(1): bstan// thabs kyis smin ma g.yas bskyod na// shes rab smin ma g.yon btegs bya// thabs kyis phyag g.yon brkyang ba dang // shes rab g.yas kyis 'khyud tshul bstan// phyag rgya gar bskor thal brdabs
353a6(1): shing // dbang mo lce la reg pa ni// tshogs mchod dus la bab pa'i brda// lag gnyis bskor nas dbang mo 'thong // de nas dbang mo lce la reg/ 'dza' gad 'dim pa'i brda thabs so// ma hA ging chen karma
353b1(1): dang / rdo rje drod kyi rtags 'dzin las// sogs pa'i brda yi dam tshig rnams// rnal 'byor can gyis spyad na 'grub// lus brda dam tshig phyag rgya'o// zhes smra ba'i seng ges gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo
353b2(1): rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor brda'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang smra ba'i seng ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnal 'byor rol pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
353b3(1): so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang // 'dus pa chen pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ smra ba'i seng ge chen po chos thams cad ni rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag cag rnams kyis
353b4(1): mthong ngo zhes gsol pa dang / smra ba'i seng ges bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje tshogs yin par shes par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs
353b5(1): kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol// sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig
353b6(1): 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam ste// rnal 'byor kun gyis spyad pa'i lam// sa mchog bgrod pa'i lam 'di dag/ 'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par
354a1(1): bya// brtsam pa las kyi dang po pa// rdo rje tshogs la 'jug pa na// khyad par rim pa ci bzhin du// las mchog 'di yi rang bzhin gyis// ji bzhin rim par sbyangs nas kyang // sa rab mchog tu
354a2(1): bgrod pa la// thabs mchog lnga yis bgrod bya ste// rdo rje tshogs dang bsnyed pa dang // nye ba dang ni bsgrub pa dang // bsgrub pa chen por sbyar bar bya// ji ltar grangs dang dus chen dang // mtshan ma byung bar
354a3(1): bcas rnams las// gab pa'i sba thabs de sbyar nas// sus mi rig pa'i thabs chen bya// de dag gsang ba'i bdag po yin// gnas 'dir 'jug pa'i byis pa dag/ 'jig rten rdul las drangs nas
354a4(1): kyang // 'gyur dbang ma nges sar bzhag ste// ci phyir dang po yin pas na// byis pa blo shed ma bye bas// bzang ngan bde sdug mi shes shing // bstan dang gsang ba'i dmigs mi byed// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bka'
354a5(1): sgo'i 'dir// gsang sgo mi dbye skrag par 'gyur// rang bzhin ngang tshul ma rtogs pa'i// so so'i skye bo byis pa las// snod med snod byas bdud nyid kyis// rnal 'byor 'tshe ba'i srog gcod cing // ma nges ldog
354a6(1): 'jug bcas pa yis// gsang 'di bcas dkar 'gyur phyir ro// de na 'di yi spyod pa yang / ji ltar 'tsham par bde thabs sbyar/ de nas smra ba'i seng ge de thabs kyi rdo rje tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
354b1(1): zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams mi snang bar gyur to// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ smra ba'i seng ge chen po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni thabs kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin du bdag cag
354b2(1): rnams kyis mthong ngo // sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di dag ni brgyud de sbas pa'i tshogs yin par shes par bya'o// rdo rje rnal 'byor tshogs ldan lnga// thabs chen phyag rgya sbas tshogs
354b3(1): lnga// rdo rje 'dzin sogs bcu drug dang // bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje can/ bri bya yang na bsam pa'am// brjod dam bsngos sam mtshan ma la// 'jig rten dbang po'i chos lugs kyis// mos pa la bskyed
354b4(1): dran byas te// rang bzhin yul nas phab nas ni// phyag bya la sogs mchod pa yis// rdo rje sman dang rtsir sbyar ba'i// yo byad chen po la sogs pas// rdo rje thabs kyi tshogs la dbul// rdo rje rnal 'byor glu blangs
354b5(1): te// mnyes byas las grub grangs rdzogs nas// mchod dang dam skongs 'dod pa bya// snod du rung ba'i slob ma dag/ dpa' mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis// 'jug tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol// rdo rje tha tshig
354b6(1): rnam lnga yis// bslab pa'i gnyen rnams ci rigs par// rtsal gyi rim par byin nas ni// rdo rje gal chen mna' 'dor ro// de nas sgrub pa che chung rnams// 'di ltar 'dod pas nan tan gyis// rdo rje rnal 'byor
355a1(1): bkar bya'o// mi nus la sogs mi gnang ba'i// dam tshig dag gis nan chags bya// rmongs pa'i gsang phyir sems bskyed de// ngo mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur// shes nas mig la shes bya'i
355a2(1): yul// thams cad rim gyis bstan par bya// drod can 'khyil ba'i blo ldan la// rnal 'byor na sbar mdzod sgo dbye// rtsing po 'gros kyis dmu rgod la// gcan 'phrang 'khor ba'i g.yeng rnams bstan// rdo rje lung
355a3(1): gi tshad can la// ji ltar nus pa de dbang bskur// btsal med mi nus yul can la// phan pa 'ba' zhig bsngags pa yin// gnas 'dir yod dang med pa dang // 'od mi bsrub cing ljid mi dbab// rdo rje blo yi
355a4(1): yul can la// rtsal chen sbyong zhes gdams par bya// rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang gral du// rdo rje don gyi ltang chen bsher// rtsal dang rim pa khyad par dbye// so so rigs kyi phyag rgya dag/ spyi'am yang na re re'o// de
355a5(1): nas smra ba'i seng ge de shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol
355a6(1): to// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni shes rab tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du gda' bar bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo // de skad ces gsol ba dang / sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i
355b1(1): tshogs chos thams cad ni shes rab tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad shes rab kyi rang bzhin las byung zhing shes rab kyi rang bzhin du gsal
355b2(1): lo// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ sem dpa' chen po shes rab gzungs kyi rang bzhin bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / sems dpa' chen pos bka'
355b3(1): stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs// shes rab gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni// rgya cher bshad kyis shes par gyis// ji ltar thabs kyis tshogs sbyar ltar// gang dag rnal 'byor mar ldan rnams// rdo
355b4(1): rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa// lha mo'i tshogs su sbyar nas kyang // gnas 'dir 'jug dga' la sogs pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya mtshan mar sbas// rdo rje mnyam pa'i gzungs rnams la/ mnyam pa'i mchod pas mnyes
355b5(1): par bya// bro gar glu tshigs la sogs pas// rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgrub// ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad zabs dang she rab phan tshun dra bar 'brel ba'i
355b6(1): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang // 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel pa'i
356a1(1): rang bzhin can du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo // zhes gsol to// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa chos thams cad
356a2(1): ni thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel ba ste/ gnyis su med par shes par gyis shig de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dra bar 'brel pa'i don bshad du
356a3(1): gsol/ sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'brel pa'i don ni 'di lta ste// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// phan tshun 'brel ba'i tshul du snang // chos kun nam mkha'a'i mtshan nyid las// sprul pa bye ba
356a4(1): cir yang snang // gnyis med dra ba'i tshul du 'brel// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i mchog yin te// rtsal dang ldan pa gsang sgo ba// 'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya// gsang 'dir chud pa'i bu rnams la// rdo rje gsang
356a5(1): ba'i bka' 'di bsgrags// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas// lnga nyid zung du 'khril ba ni// g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril 'khyud sbyor// g.yas nyid byang chub
356a6(1): dang // rang rang mtshan ma 'bar ba'o// g.yon gyi sgra snyan dril bu dang // rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la// 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i mdangs ldan pas// chags shing g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni// seng chen khyu mchog
356b1(1): la sogs pa// rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te// kha dog lnga yi 'ong 'bar bas// bcu drug chas na sgeg pa rnams// rim gyis bskyed dang cig car bskyed// dbang po'i rim pa sbyar bar bya// gsang nyid
356b2(1): tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyang // gnas nas gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// phyag rgya rgyal po rgya mor bcas// brgyad gnyis zung sgril 'khril 'khyud sbyor// sa dang nam mkha' spyan rdo rje// byams dang rdo rje kun bzang
356b3(1): dpal// nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni// gzhi gnyis dag gis mnyes sbyor ba// bsam bya la sogs de bzhin no// rdo rje sgo dang bcas pa ni// rdo rje 'khril 'khyud gsang ba'i tshogs// rnal 'byor longs spyod che sbyar
356b4(1): bas// mnyes nas skongs phyir rim bzhin dbul/ gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis// gsang ba'i don rnams sgrub par byed// ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje de rdo rje
356b5(1): kun du 'brel ba'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje dra ba'i
356b6(1): dbyings su bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs dra ba'i dbyings su shes par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni thugs kyi rig pa las byung la thugs
357a1(1): kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje kho na yin pa'i phyir ro// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dra ba chen po'i tshogs bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
357a2(1): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje chen po rig pa'i don// dra ba 'brel ba'i dbyings nyid ni// nges par bshad kyis rtse gcig nyon// thugs kyi gsang chen rig pa 'di// nges pa'i rdo
357a3(1): rje yin pas na// rdo rje dbang yul 'brel ba'i don// thams cad 'byung bas dbyings shes bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dzin sogs bcas// 'khril mnyam pa yang de bzhin te// gzugs brnyan ting 'dzin rang bzhin
357a4(1): gnas// rim pa'i tshul bzhin sbyar byas nas// ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ro// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de thams cad dus bzhi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
357a5(1): la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dus
357a6(1): bzhi mnyam pa nyid du gcig par mthong ngo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni dus bzhi mnyam par rtog pa yin te/ chos thams cad ni dus
357b1(1): bzhi'i ngang du rdzogs par shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la dus snga phyir snang ba med do// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa chen po'i
357b2(1): dus nyid bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po yi ni tshogs// mnyam pa nyid kyi dus rig na// dus zhes bya ba'i
357b3(1): ming yang med// dus bzhi mnyam par rab shes na// chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no// rdo rje dus kyi lha mo'i tshogs// 'das dang da ltar byung ba dang // mi 'byung ba yi cha rnams la// dbang sgyur mnyam pa'i
357b4(1): rgyal mo rnams// 'jig dang skye dang smin pa dang / 'gag par gyur ba de dag du// rdo rje rnam thar tshad med dang // sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi// shes rab 'khor dang dpal gyi dkyil// de bzhin rim par
357b5(1): rdo rje yi// glu gar la sogs yo byad kyis// mchod dang 'jug tshul gong ma bzhin// cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar// lha yi nyi ma rnams la'o// bde ba chen po la sogs pa// tshom bu'ang yang na phyag rgya
357b6(1): rnams// spyir ram re rer sbyar bar bya// 'das la rnam thar tshogs bskul te// da lta byung dang mi 'byung la// tshad med sems dang mnyam par bskrun// mnyam pa'i rgyal por de 'gyur te// bde gshegs dus kyi
358a1(1): rgyal por 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje/ nyi zla'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang ting nge 'dzin de las
358a2(1): bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni nyi zla'i tshogs su mthong ngo // de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
358a3(1): bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi rlung bzhin ni byang chub sems dang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yin par shes par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni byang chub sems las byung zhing snying
358a4(1): rje'i rang bzhin can yin no// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan/ 'das snying rje dang byang chub sems kyi don bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
358a5(1): rnams kun gyi yo byad ni// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// yo byad de dag ma ldan na// don rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor byang chub sems rdzogs pa// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i zla rgyas tshul// snying
358a6(1): rje ye shes shar ba ni// mkhas la nyi gsal shar ba'i tshul// don gnyis rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor nges pa'i sa pa yin// nges pa'i sa la bgrod pa ni// rdo rje dus kyi rgyun tshogs kyis// tshogs chen
358b1(1): rnam gnyis bskrun par bya// skar tshogs dbus na zla nya ba// bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa bzhin// bcu gsum rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa// bcu drug tshogs kyis rdzogs pas ni// mdzes pa'i nyi ma bcu drug
358b2(1): gis// zla dkyil 'od kyi phyag rgya la// mdzes par spras pa'i bde ba de// bcu drug tshogs kyis bsod nams bskrun// phyed rdzogs tshogs 'phel de phan chad// mi dmags chos la blo sbyangs yin// je zhi je zhi mi
358b3(1): dmigs pa/ mtshan ma shes bya bsrabs pa ste// bsod nams tshogs kyang mi dmigs pa/ mnyam pas stong par gyur pa na// thams cad chos skur rdzogs pa ste// sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med de// 'di la
358b4(1): rmad 'byung sems bskyed de// zla ba dus kyis mtshan ma dang // gsang ba gnyis kyis mchod par bya// phra mo'i drod du byung ba dang // sbyar te rang las byung rnams la// rtsa ba gcad phyir yongs rdzogs pas// the tshom
358b5(1): med par dang blangs nas/ dus de nyid du nyi ma 'char// dus 'di rgyun gyi bar bcad na// bsnyed pa dag gis bzlog par dka'// bar chad byung na gso zhing bskang // mkha' la zla gsal gra rgyas na// sa la rnal
358b6(1): 'byor grar rgyas pas/ bsod nams spel ba chen po dang // bsngo ba chen po'i las rnams bya// de nas 'bras bu chen po yang // nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba yi// rig 'dzin sa la slebs phan chad// dpal chen bcu
359a1(1): drug sa la 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de rgyun du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bzhengs pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol
359a2(1): pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yi ge rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ni rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin la// rgyal
359a3(1): pab thams cad ni yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du shes par gyis shig/ gsol ba/ yi ge phyag rgya'i don gang lags pa bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis
359a4(1): bka' stsal pa/ chos kun rgyal ba'i rang bzhin// rgyal ba sku gsung thugs su gsal// sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya dag/ yi ge'i phreng ba nyid la rdzogs// yi ge phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnams// rgyun du bsgrub
359a5(1): par bya ba yin// des ni rgyun gyi ting 'dzin thob// rgyun gyi rgyun du mi gcad pa// rdo rje nam dang nyi tshod la// yi ge'i tshogs bskyed tshogs sbyar la// phud lhag bcas sbyar de bzhin no// 'di ni don la nye ba'i
359a6(1): lam// bsod nams bskrun par de myur ro// kun rdzogs tshogs kyi rgyu des ni// yang dag tshogs chen ci 'dra ba// mchog gi bde ba dam pa dang // de nyid chen por de nyid 'gyur// 'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba
359b1(1): mthun// thams cad gcig par gyur pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun sum tshogs// mdza' 'phrod sman dang dgyes sbyor ldan// lha dang rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ril// ma lus tshogs pas chos 'di spyad// skad cig
359b2(1): yud dam zad cig gam// yud tsam nyin zhag zla re 'am// lha yi nyi ma bkra shis kyi// tshogs la bab pa'i dus 'di dag/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus chen yin// ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad rnams// phyi dag nang
359b3(1): gi khyad par gyis// gtsang ma'i kha zas 'byung po la// rnam rtog rtog bral rgyal ba la// ji ltar 'byor bzhin nan tan bya// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang // chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i// skyon bzhi po dag
359b4(1): spangs nas ni// de las bzlog pa'i tshul lnga pas// rnal 'byor snying dang mig lta bu// gdung pa'i 'du shes nyer bzhag ste// ji bzhin 'dod pa'i nye bar sbyar// lha rnams nye bar bya ba dang // bgegs rnams zhi
359b5(1): pabar bya ba dang // don grub shi ba gso ba'i phyir// las 'dir spyad par shin tu gces// tshogs 'di blo chung gsar zhugs pa'i// mdun du brjod par bya mi rigs// rdzas dang yo byad thams kyang // cis 'dus de
359b6(1): ltar stobs kyis spyad// des na las 'di khyad par yang // tshogs la tshogs bskyed sgrib sbyangs te// bsnyen pa dag la goms byas nas// bsgrubs pas 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// rgyud kyi
360a1(1): rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rigs pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor bde ba'i tshogs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang smra ba'i seng ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de 'das pa brjod pa zhes bya
360a2(1): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang // 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngags zab mo spyod pa'i
360a3(1): skyon dang yon tan ci lags par bdag cag gi rig pa la snang bar gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gsang sngags chen po'i don ni rab tu spyad par dka'
360a4(1): pabar shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// gsang sngags kyi tshogs ni shin tu me dang 'dra ste// me ni rgyun du bcangs shing spyad legs na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rgyun du spyad du yod do// me nyid ji lta ba
360a5(1): bzhin du spyad na me'i phung po chen por 'gyur te// spyod par byed pa nyid kyang bsregs/ khyim nas khyim yang bsregs/ rdzas kyi dngos po thams cad kyang bsregs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gsang sngags 'di ni
360a6(1): chu dang 'dra ste/ chu thabs kyis zan cing spyad legs na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga' bder spyad du yod de// chu la dga' ba der thar chu chen po la 'brogs par nus so// chu'i rang bzhin dang thabs la ma gos
360b1(1): pas ni spyod par byed pa de g.yeng zhing 'chi bar byed do// gzhan yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni gcan gzan gdug pa can dang 'dra ste// gcan gzan gyis sems can gzhan gyi srog gcod par byed pa
360b2(1): yang thabs la mkhas pas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du dbang du 'du'o// thabs kyis ma zin na srog gcod par byed do// gzhan yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dang
360b3(1): 'dra ste/ sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu thabs kyis yongs su zin na ni dbang du 'du zhing spyad du yod la// thabs kyis ma zin na ni 'tsho ba srog dang 'bral bar byed do// de bas na gsang ba chen po 'di
360b4(1): ni spyad par dka' bas sngon gyi dus kyi tshe na yang spyad nyes pa'i log pa'i lam pa can mang por byung ngo // don dang lam la mkhas pa'i skyes bus thabs kyis zin cing spyad legs na ma nor ba'i lam du zhugs pa
360b5(1): yang mang por byur bas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs spyad pa'i thabs la yongs su mkhas par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
360b6(1): gsang sngags log pa'i lam las byung ba ni gang gang lags/ spyad legs pa'i thabs las byung ba ni gang gang lags/ bdag cag la rgya cher bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
361a1(1): kyis 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs nyes legs kyi rim pa bshad par bya yis nyon cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / nga ni dran pa thog ma'i tshe/ gsang ba spyod
361a2(1): pa'i don 'di dag nges don phal cher nub par gyur/ tshul 'dra tsam zhig gnas pa la// kun kyang phal cher spyod mod kyang // don dang phyed pa ngas ma mthong // kun kyang log pa'i lam spyad do// log pa can nyid
361a3(1): gang zhe na// 'di la mi gnas 'di nyams dang / 'di las log dang logs tshul spyod// 'di tshul ma yin 'dir ma nges// g.yo sgyus bden bcos 'gal ba'i lam// de yang ji ltar bu zhe na// bskal pa kun
361a4(1): bkod bya ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas mngon byung rgyal po de// mya ngan 'das par gyur 'og tu// byung ba'i rnal 'byor bzang rgyan de// mi shes byis pa'i 'khor rnams la// tshul 'chos log pa'i tshogs bskyangs
361a5(1): sa// tshom bu lnga brgyar bcas pa zhig/ don las gol zhing 'khor bar log/ de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rmad byung mkhas pa'i bstan pa 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshad ma rnams// phal cher mi gnas
361a6(1): skabs dag tu// mi shes ngan rtog can rnams kyis// dkrugs 'gyur bka' bslad bzhung por te// nor pas bdag nyid sun 'byin cing // bdag yin gzhan 'di ma yis zhes// bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa
361b1(1): log/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bskal pa de nyid dus dag la// rnal 'byor dpa' sbyin bya ba zhig/ don la blo shed ma bye zhing // lam gyi thabs las mi mkhas pas// nges don bka' yi gzhung bor nas// chos ma
361b2(1): yin pa'i chos spyod cing // gzhan dag nges don spyod pa la// khyod kyi de ni don ma yin// don mchog bdud rtsi gang yin pa// de ni nga yi chos 'di yin// zhes ni bdag bstod gzhan la smod// 'di yang srid pa
361b3(1): log pa'i lam// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ sngar byung rgyud kyi rjes gnas pas// rdeng med bzhin du dpon bstabs na// tshig gnyer dregs pa'i dbang des ni// mi shes bzhin du ras gcod pa'i// tshul
361b4(1): 'chos sems kyi gya gyu can// skyon thabs blun pa'i sdig can yin// de yang ji ltar bu zhe na// dge slong dri med spyod pa zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor tshul 'dra zhig/ don la mkhas pa'i rjes su byung // tshom bu 'bum
361b5(1): gyi 'khor rnams kyis// rgyud kyi rjes su byung ba yis// don med dge slong de nyid la// tshig gi gnyer chen ljid phab pas// gdung 'tshob ces ni dpon bstabs te// che ba chen po'i dregs pa skyes// mi shes
361b6(1): bzhin du tshul bcos te// 'dra tshul log pa'i chos spyad pas// tshom bu 'bum dang bcas pa zhig/ dreg pa chen po'i ru drar lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ mdza' 'drin bslang ster zhing rnams dang // rnyed
362a1(1): dang bkur stes 'tsho ba'i 'khor// gzhan gyi dbang du gyur dogs nas/ sgo ris rkyang chen so sor gcod// 'khor 'di bdag gis smin bya yi// gdul bar bya ba'i zhing yin gyis// gang dag 'di
362a2(1): dang ma 'brel zhes// nyon mongs tshig gis sgo byed nor// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnam 'byor na zhi gnas pa zhes// bya ba'i tshom bu lnga brgya zhig/ shin tu gsang sngags spyod do zhes// dgon pa'i gnas su 'du
362a3(1): gnas ni// yul khams chen po de dag gis// gnas par gyur pa'i mi rnams kun// gdul bar bya ba'i zhing du spyod// gzhan gyi sde par gyur pa yi// dge slong don dang ldan pa zhig/ yul der ched du 'ongs nas
362a4(1): ni// rnal 'byor nges pa'i lam mchog gcig/ rgya cher bstan par bsam pa las/ dge slong dgon par gnas pa des// nyon mongs tshig gi bsgo ba byas// 'khor 'di bdag gi zhing yin gyis// khyod ni 'di la
362a5(1): ma gtogs zhes// sgo dang tshan dang ris bcad pas// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i la du lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rnal 'byor chen por bsngos gyur la/ sna 'gas ci rgyal gsog 'jog byed// gcig yid
362a6(1): gcig gis 'byin byed pa// nam zhar longs spyod thob pa min// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor bde ldan shes pa zhes// bya ba'i tshom bur bcas pa zhig/ gsang ba rgya cher spyod pa las// 'khor na gnas
362b1(1): pa'i rnal 'byor ma// bud med bzang ldan bya ba zhig/ tshogs sbyor ging du bskos pa las// 'byor ba'i yo byad de dag la// ser sna'i sems kyis gsog 'jog byas// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// yi dwags khyi
362b2(1): yi lus su skyes// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ gzhan yang rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs// log par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// log lta spyi brtol gtum khro che// sdig spyod don dang mi ldan yang // bdag ni yang
362b3(1): dag yin no zhes// bab tshol bka' rku slu byed bslad// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ chos skyong ba yi rnal 'byor pa// pra ma de zhes bya ba zhig/ don dang lam la mi mkhas par// bdag ni mkhan po yin no zhes// kun
362b4(1): la rgya cher sgra bsgrags nas// rgyal ba'i bka' brkus 'gro ba rnams// bslus par gyur pa'i rnam smin gyis// log pa can gyi 'jig rten pa// mi stegs spyod pa'i khams su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod
362b5(1): cig/ tha tshig nyams shing don la rmugs// dregs pas don la khas 'ches phyir// rdo rje rgyal dbang thob 'dod pa// khrel med spyi brtol mun sbrul 'tshal// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor sngags kyi tshul spyod
362b6(1): pa// pe na ya zhes bya ba bzhig/ tshom bu brgya dang bcas pa byung / rtsa ba nyams shing don la rmugs// dregs pa chen po'i nga rgyal gyis// don la mkhas pa'i tshul bcos phyir// rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang mnos
363a1(1): pas// ri bos srog chags mnan pa bzhin// nga rgyal dregs pa'i ri bo yis// 'khor ba'i las spyod las ngan pa'i// srog chags phag gi rigs su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ mnyam
363a2(1): pa'i don nyid ma rtogs par/ tshig du mnyam zhes rjod byed cing // chags sdang gnyis la mngon 'chel ba// rnal 'byor las kyis 'khor ba'i lam// de yang ji ltar bu zhe na// dge slong bde sbyin bya ba zhig/ tshom
363a3(1): bu stong dang bcas par de// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i las la spyod// la la chags la mngon par 'chel// la las sdang chen gsod par spyod// chags sdang las kyi rnam smin gyis// rak+Sha srin pa'i khams
363a4(1): su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ gang dag rnal 'byor blo chug rnams// rdo rje gral tshogs don glengs na// de la 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur te// spa zhum mi dga' 'byol byed blun// de yang ji lta bu zhe
363a5(1): na// dge slong lhas byin bya ba zhig/ rnal 'byor dang po'i sar slob tshe// rnal 'byor don ldan mang po rnams// phal cher tshogs par gyur pa la// nges don gsang ba'i don glengs na// lhas byin 'khor bcas de
363a6(1): las byol// don gleng ba la mi dga' zhing // ngan pa'i sems kyis phrag dog skyes// rang gi gnas su song nas ni// mkhas pa de la mi snyan brjod// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// bskal pa dpag tu med pa
363b1(1): ru// yang dag don las gol bar 'gyur// 'khor ba don med gnas su 'khyams// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rnal 'byor nyid kyis rnal 'byor la// shin tu gdug pa'i dug mdas gtong // tha tshig btsan
363b2(1): po rdzong lta bu// 'joms byed rnal 'byor rang bges so// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor rnam dag blo gros zhes// bya ba'i don ldan mkhas pa zhig/ mi 'jigs blo gros zhes bya ba'i// thabs dang don la mi
363b3(1): mkhas pa// sde pa mang po skyong ba'i sar// rnam dag blo gros 'khor bcas 'ongs// mkhas pa don ldan bzod thob la// ngan sems phyar ka'i sgro skur btab// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// mi 'jigs blo gros
363b4(1): mnar me lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ lta ba dmigs bu dang bral bas// yang dag dbu ma'i lam mi gsal// spyi yul tsam la ltos spyod pa// de ni rnal 'byor long pa'i tshogs// de yang ji lta bu zhe
363b5(1): na// rgyal po rab gsal 'dzin pa zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig byung // shes rab lta ba'i med med par// rnal 'byor ming tsam tshul bzung nas// sgra thos tsam gyi gzhung spyad pas// mig med 'khor ba'i
363b6(1): khams su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ de la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// log pa'i tshogs su spyad pas ni// 'khor ba log pa'i tshus su 'gyur// de na 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// shin tu gsang
364a1(1): ba'i chos 'di rnams// gol sa che bar rgyal bas bshad// thabs la mkhas par spyod pa yis// don dang ldan par bya ba gces// thabs la mkhas par spyad pa yi// legs pa'i lam gyi rnal 'byor
364a2(1): pa// sngon 'das dus na byung ba yi// rtsal can rnams kyi don bshad pa// skyes bu mchog gi spyod pa 'di// yon tan sgra bsgrags sus thos pa// ming tsam gyis kyang de thob cing // dran pas ngan 'gro las skyob
364a3(1): yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// shin tu gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di// lha gnas gsum du grags pa las// lha yi bu ni 'od ldan te// mi rtag 'chi ba'i dus bab nas// 'chi ka'i snga ltas byung ba'i tshe// mi dga' bar ni
364a4(1): 'du shes gyur// phyi ma'i 'du shes skyed pa las// mi gtsang zas su za ba yi// blun pa'i srog chags lus len par// rang gi mngon par shes pas mthong // shin tu 'jigs pa'i 'du shes kyis// skyabs kyi yul
364a5(1): rnams yid la byas// gzhan gyi dran pa mi gsal bar// gsang ba chen po'i tshogs chen gyis// mtshan ni rna ba'i dbang po thos// thos pa yid la dran byas pas// ngan 'gro'i lam las slar log ste// tshogs
364a6(1): chen spyod pa'i skal ldan pas// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas su skyes// de bzhin thos pa dag par spyod// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i tshogs 'di la// gang zhig dga' zhing 'dun skyed pa// gzhan gyi bar chad mi 'byung
364b1(1): bar// ji ltar mos pa de myur 'thob// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bram ze'i bu ni byams ldan te// gsang ba chen po'i tshogs 'di dag/ spyod par mos nas kun tu btsal// btsal bas rnyed par ma gyur te// sa
364b2(1): phyogs zhig tu 'dug nas ni// shin tu ngus nas smras pa ni// e ma'o bdag gi las re pham// skyes nas rgas par gyur bar du// tshogs chen zab mo'i don btsal na// don dang ma phrang las re ngan// da 'ong ji
364b3(1): ltar btsal na rnyed// btsal byas rnyed par yong mi 'gyur// thugs rjes bdag la skyabs su 'chi// gdung ba sgra cher phyung ba las// nam mkha'i khams nas sgra phyung ste// skal dang ldan pa'i bram ze khyod// de ltar
364b4(1): yi dam la brten pa// khyod ni don gyi skal pa can// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thams cad kyis// khyod la byin gyis rlob par mdzad// de bas lta ba ma g.yel bar// sgrib pa sbyang ba'i thabs dag la// mkhas shing
364b5(1): brtson par bya dgos te// rang gi rtsa rnams bkros nas ni// khrag chen dag gis mchod pa de// 'dod chags dag pa tsan+dan chus// dmigs nas rgyal ba kun mchod nas// de ma thag tu don thob 'gyur// de skad
364b6(1): lung bstan thob nas ni// dga' ba'i bsam pa cher g.yos te// lung bstan pa ltar de spyad pas// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i sras su gyur// de bzhin mos pa dag par spyod// mthong la skal ldan 'dir zhugs
365a1(1): pa// thams cad du yang de bzhin te// tog ni rtse mor gyur pa bzhin// yongs kyi nub pa ma yin no// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// lha yi bu zhes bya ba ni// dge ba'i rgyal po bya ba de// tshom bu 'bum dang
365a2(1): bcas pa zhig/ gsang ba rgya cher spyad pa las// lta bu rin chen 'od ldan de// shin tu dad pa cher g.yos te// lha rdzas yo byad mang po dang // bcas nas gsang ba'i gnas der phyin// dga' zhing 'dun pa'i tshul
365a3(1): gyis ni// gus par gyur te der gnas pas// cho 'phrul chen po bzhi thob ste// lha gnas kun du bgrod pa dang // 'byung chen lus las sprul pa dang // ri bo gdeg dang 'phang ba dang // mi 'chi tshe la gnas
365a4(1): pa thob// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i tog bzhin du// mthong ba dag pa'i chos de nyid// bska par nub par ma gyur ro// de bzhin 'jug pa dag par gyis// mthong bas chos 'di yongs dag pas// ye shes sgron ma'i mig
365a5(1): rnyed nas// bla med snying po can rnams kyis// lam rnyed lam du zhugs pa bzhin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bram ze kun ri bya ba zhig/ chos kyi mig ldan don mthong nas// gsang chen gzhung bzhin spyod pa
365a6(1): la// bram ze kai ni bya ba zhig/ dad pas don gyi rjes su 'brengs// gsang chen 'dus pa'i tshogs mthong ba// chos kyi mig dang ldan 'gyur te// don gyi snying po mthong bar 'gyur// lhun grub rtsal chen rdzogs pa
365b1(1): yi// rig 'dzin chen po'i sa nyid thob// de bzhin mthong bas dag par gyis// gzhan dag 'dir ni mngon spyod la// dga' ba'i yid kyis phyogs byed pa// de ni dngos dang 'dra ba ste// 'bras bu la yang mtho
365b2(1): dman med// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ldan zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig la// tshom bu bcu dang bcas pa'i 'khor// rig 'dzin spyod pa'i don la zhugs// sngags spyod 'bras bu
365b3(1): cher thob ste// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul mang po dag/ thob pa kun tu grags par 'gyur// de la gzhan gyi sde pa yi// bram ze dge slob bya ba zhig/ shin tu dag pa'i sems bskyed nas// 'jug cing bslab par zhugs pa
365b4(1): las// rgyal pos ma gnang gsang sgo bsdams// bram ze dad pa ma log par// 'byor pa'i yo byad ci yod rnams// rgyal po 'khor du phul nas kyang // rgyal po gnas pa'i yul phyogs su// yid kyi phyogs te smon
365b5(1): lam btab// rtse gcig par ni smon lam btab// rjes su yi rang dam par ni// yid la byas pa'i bsod nams kyis// sgrub par byed pa'i rgyal po dang // sgrub dang mi ldan bram ze gnyis// 'bras bu mtho dman
365b6(1): med par thob// 'di ni tshegs med don po che// thabs la mkhas pa'i rig 'dzin yin// de bzhin spyod pa gzhan dag la// dga' bas rjes su yi rang gis// dge ba spyad dang ma spyad gnyis// 'bras bu mnyam
366a1(1): por thob par gyur// bsam yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rgyal rnams 'dir bslab 'dir mkhyen pas// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bshes gnyen du// kun gyi bdag por gyur pa yin// de yang ji ltar
366a2(1): bu zhe na// sngon gyi bram ze gsal byin gyis// gsang chen 'di yi don bslabs nas// rang gi sems la goms byas nas// sems nyid bden pa'i don mthong ste// chos rnams kun la mkhas par 'gyur/
366a3(1): ro// kun gyi rtsa ba sems yin pas// sems las chos byung 'bum phrag yas// chos kyi rgyal por der gyur nas// sangs rgyas smra ba'i seng ge zhes// zhing khams kun tu grags par 'gyur// de bzhin bslab par
366a4(1): dag par gyis// tshogs chen gcig gi bsod nams ni// skye la nyan thos bsam yas la// sbyin pa'i tshogs chen spel bas ni// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// ci phyir zhen gcig mnyes pas// rgyal ba thams
366a5(1): cad mnyes pa yin// nam mkha' khyab pa'i rgyal ba dang // nyag gcig snang ba'i rgyal ba gnyis// so so ma yin tha mi dad// sku dang gsung thugs gcig las med// 'dul ba'i ngo gang khyad par las// bsam
366a6(1): gyis mi khyab bstan par zad// de na khyad par de ltar snang // de yang ji lta bu zhe na// las rnams dag pa'i bram ze ni// dge ldan gsal ldan bya ba gnyis// dga' ba'i dad pa so sor skyes// gcig la gcig
366b1(1): ni tha tshig byas// gcig gis nyan thos bsam yas la// mchod sbyin bya ba rgya cher byas// gcig gis tshogs mchod rgya cher byas// tshogs la spyod pa'i gsal ldan ni// 'di tshe gcig la mngon sangs rgyas// sbyin
366b2(1): pa spel ba'i dge ldan ni// bskal pa grangs med gsum gyis grub// de bas gnas 'dir spyod pa dag/ rnal 'byor gsal ldan tshul bzhin spyod// 'di dag rtag tu su 'chang ba// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
366b3(1): pa'i// che yon rtag tu ci 'dra bar// don gyi gzugs dang bcas par 'thob// de yang ji lta du zhe na// khyim bdag mes sbyin bya ba de// tshom bu brgya dang bcas pa zhig/ rgyun gyi rtag par 'di spyad pas// sangs
366b4(1): rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' ni// 'khor dang bcas pa ci 'dra bar// skye ba de yis nges par thob// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// don du nges par sgrub pa'i tshogs// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// goms dang
366b5(1): brjod dang spros pa yis// chos kyi rgyal por de 'gyur zhing // yon tan spyi gtsug nyid du 'gyur// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ drang srong rnal 'byor ka la ya nas// drang srongs rnam pa mang po la// tshogs 'di yon tan rgya
366b6(1): cher bsgrags// don rnams nges par bshad pa las// drang srong mang pos rig 'dzin thob// ston par byed pa'i ka la ya na// gsang bdag chos kyi rgyal por gyur// 'on tang gsang ba'i don 'di dag/ snod dang
367a1(1): ldan pa'i 'gro ba la// bstan tam bshad dam brjod par gyis// des ni yon tan chen po dang / nga yi spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur// des na 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam
367a2(1): ni// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i tshogs 'di yin// rnal 'byor gang zhig blo ldan pas// skad cig tsam mam thang cig la// rgyal ba'i tshogs 'di rab bskrun na// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig 'dzin
367a3(1): rnal 'byor mtha' dag dang // tha tshig zab mo skongs nas kyang // chos kyi mig ni thob par 'gyur// de ni tshogs spyad yon tan dang // log par spyad pa'i skyon rnams ni// sngon byung gleng gzhi bshad pa yin// zhes
367a4(1): sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las 'das pa sngon byung gi le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje
367a5(1): de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de'i zhal du shin tu re zhing bka' sdod pa'i tshul gyis lta zhing kun du brjid par 'khor gyis bskul ba'i sa la sta gon du gnas shing cang mi smra bar gyur to//
367a6(1): nas 'khor phal po ches rnam par bskul bar rig nas rnal 'byor gyi phyag lus kun sa la brdabs nas a la la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas mgrin gcig tu gsol ba btab pa// e ma rdo rje sems chen
367b1(1): po/ rang rig mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'bar// mgon po yon tan bsam las 'das// rgyal thob khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma rang snang dbyer med sku// rnam dag bsod nams mtshan gyis brgyan// dpe byad 'bru
367b2(1): bkod blta mi ngoms// sku lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma rnam dag nam mkha'i dbyings// gcig gsung sna tshogs sgrar rig mkhyen// bsam 'das brjod med rdo rje'i gsung // gsung lnga'i mchog la phyag
367b3(1): 'tshal lo// e ma gsang ba nam mkha'i thugs// mnyam nyid mi g.yo so sor gsal// kun rig snying po ye shes mchog/ thugs lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma mi mdzad mdzad pa che// ma chags chags
367b4(1): bral 'dod chags mdzod// thams cad sgrol ba'i las chen po// phrin las mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal tshab khyod la gsol ba ni// byams mgon thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// sprul pa'i go tshags ru
367b5(1): mnyam ste// 'khor ba'i skyes lings chen po la// sdug bsngal shin tu gsad pa'i phyir// thams cad dur khrod chen po ru// byin gyis brlabs pa'i las chen mdzod// a ho zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ sems
367b6(1): dpa' rdo rje chen po des rnal 'byor pa'i phyag byas nas// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la zhus pa// a la la ho bde ba chen po'i mchog gsang ba kun gyi rgyal po/ yang gsang bla na med
368a1(1): pa'i bdag nyid/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rmad du byung ba'i tshig shin tu rtul phod pa gsol ba 'chal ba 'di shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// 'di dag 'dul ba'i dbang du dgongs te/ ji ltar 'tshal
368a2(1): ba'i bsam pa rangs par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des kun du 'dul ba'i 'dus mkhyen nas bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i 'khor gyis
368a3(1): bskor ba dur khrod rgyan gyi rol pa las rmad du byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i tshig 'di gsungs so// hUM he he phaT/ hUM hU~M bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dza la
368a4(1): maN+Dal la A ra li a li u li ta pa li traM s+t+waM/ kha li ho/ na sha staM b+ha ya hUM/ bruM phu tsa kha hi phaT phaT ha la hUM zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad dur khrod kyi dkyil 'khor du
368a5(1): gyur nas/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ shin tu rnam par 'thor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'khor gzhan gyis yid tshod du mi 'gyur ba'i sku'i
368a6(1): chos bstan pa ni sku kun du dur khrod kyi bdag po chen por bsgyur nas dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad dang // he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang // dpal gyi chas brgyad dang // dur khrod kyi rgyan chen po dgu dang / don gyi
368b1(1): rtags chen po bco brgyad dang // dur khrod kyi longs spyod sna tshogs pa bstan pas zhal 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis gzigs pa las sems dpa' rdo rje des mkhyen te// bka' gsang dbang chen 'dis don du ni
368b2(1): bshad/ tshig tu bsgrags par rig nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la shin tu ldem dgongs kyi tshig tu smras pa// bka' gsang rmad byung chen po 'di sbas pas zab cing rtogs dka' ba// mtshon pas don 'byin mi shes
368b3(1): pas// nyon mongs rang dga' spyod snyam pa'i// shin tu byis pa'i blo zhan pa'i// nges pa'i shes rab mig ldongs te// don gyi rtsal shugs chung ba yis// dga' bde'i longs spyod bskrun snyam nas// mtshan ma rang
368b4(1): dgar spyad bsgrubs kyang // rang bzhin 'grub par mi 'gyur te// rgyud phung 'bras bu tshig gyur nas// myu gu brlag ste ga la 'byung // gtan tshig de bas 'di don dag/ rtsal zhan dag la bstan min
368b5(1): zhes// gsang bdag rgyal po kun gsung na// ci khyod rnams kyis mi shes sam// zhes rnam par smras pa las// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis slar gsol pa// e ma'o sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i rgyu tshig chen po dag
368b6(1): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang dam pa 'dir gsung ngam/ 'on te mi spyod dam cang ma lags grang / ci blang dor mdzad dam/ e ma snod du ma gyur pa ni gang mchis/ thams cad byang chub kyi snying po can lags
369a1(1): na/ zong kun rab tu thong / rnam par rab tu gsungs/ 'gag pa mi mnga' mi 'gog gsungs// ci phyir mi gsung thogs med sras// rgyal ba'i sras po dus 'di lags// gsang ba'i snying po snod
369a2(1): 'di lags// bka' gsang dkyil 'khor gnas 'di lags// gsang ba'i dur khrod tshul 'di lags// snying rje zher sems khyod la 'dud// gsang ba yang gsang khyod la 'dud// gsang ba ye gsang khyod la
369a3(1): 'dud// dkyil 'khor rgyal po khyod la 'dud// 'khor lo snying po khyod la 'dud// gsang chen snying po tshul ci lags// bka' gsang dkyil 'khor thabs ci lags// 'bras bu bde ba'i don ci lags/ ma
369a4(1): 'ongs pa yi rnal 'byor dag/ bsgrubs na dang len 'tshal ba yi// rig par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci lags// 'byung chen rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pa las// sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de
369a5(1): shin tu bzhad pa chen pos rnam par bzhad de// a a he he'i gad rgyangs bsgrags pas 'khor thams cad kyang gad rgyangs kyi sgra chen po sgrogs par mdzad de// dgyes pa'i 'od zer las shes rab kyi dpal de
369a6(1): dgyes pa'i rol mo sna tshogs ling long phyed par byung ngo // de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de lus kun bsrang ste/ dur khrod kyi chas sna tshogs bsar zhing rtags bco brgyad 'bar bar byas nas brjid pa'i
369b1(1): gsung gis gsang sngags rgya mtsho dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs don gyi bsgrub pa rtags kyi rol pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dag bshad do// gcig tu yang dag nges grub pa'i// don la rton byed rnal
369b2(1): 'byor rnams// thogs med nyid du 'grub 'dod pa// ji ltar btso blag mkhan dag gis// ras dkar sbyangs pas tshon 'dzin ltar// rnal 'byor las rnams dang por ni// skongs dang sbyong ba'i las rnams
369b3(1): gces// zab mor 'jug pa'i sngon logs nas// sems nyid gting nas tshar gcad phyir// theg pa dman pa'i skye bo dang // lhan cig ci la'ang mi brnal lo// de las gyur pa'i yo byad dag/ rus sbal mgo la
369b4(1): 'ongs pa dag/ shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sems chen gyis// rgya mtshos bshugs te spang bar bya// gal te gang zag dbang gis na// nyams pa'i chad par byung ba na/ mgon tshun chos nyid chu phab nas// skong zlog cho ga/
369b5(1): rgya cher bya// sgrub rtsom sngon nam yang sngon nam// zhag grangs dag gi sngon logs nas// sdig sbyangs byang chub sems bskyed de// dge ba'i don la 'dun par bya// slong mo dang slong la dga' ba// slong la 'tsho ba'i
369b6(1): tshe spyod rnams// sde dang tshan dang grar byas te/ snying rje lud pa'i zhing du bya// sman dang 'bru dang rtsi rnams dang // bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa dag/ btags sam phye mar sbyar nas kyang // klung ngam chu klung mtsho chen
370a1(1): du// dor te chags med sbyin par bya// dge ba'i yon bdag dang blangs te// nad gso shes slob spyod sgom gra// gtsugs te bsti gnas mchog bya zhing // dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchod chen bya// gsung
370a2(1): sgra rgya mtsho sgrogs pa yi// glegs bam zab mo kun bsten te// brjod dang bsnyen bkur bsti gnas kyis// rgya chen yangs pa'i las rnams bya// ye shes tshogs rnams rdzogs bya'i phyir// shes rab tshogs kyi sbyin
370a3(1): mchog dag/ bstan tam glegs bam la sogs pa'i// blo mchog ldan pa rnams la sbyin// bsgom dang goms par bya ba yis// kun gzhi dag par bya ba'i phyir// ting 'dzin bye ba mang po la// blo mchog yid kyi
370a4(1): rtsal de spyad// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te// rgyud sbyang lhag pa'i shes rab blta// sho gam srang dang sho gam lam// mi bde'i gnod pa kun gsal te// tshad med snying rje'i 'khor lo bskor// sbyin pa'i 'khor
370a5(1): lo rgyun mi gcad// chu 'am sa'am nam mkha' 'am// me 'am de bzhin rlung rnams la// sku gdung spel mchod ring bsrel rnams/ brtsam pa'i las chen 'khor lo bya// mtshan med zlog par byed pa yi// lus
370a6(1): sems rgyud la rdul rlags te// 'phags pa'i sbyin tshogs pho brang du// rdul snyed lus kyis mchod sems bshags// rgyal mnyes las ni gyis shig pa// thams chen sbyong pa'i las chen las// rnam bzhi me yi las
370b1(1): mchog bya// des ni mtshams med zlog pa yin// thugs rje 'byung ba'i 'khor lo dag/ gang ltar goms ltar 'bad rtsol bya// bstan pa skyong ba'i tshogs rnams la// sbyin mchod spel ba'i las rnams bya// de
370b2(1): la sogs pa'i dge ba'i tshogs// don du mi 'gyur kun spangs la// nan tan tshogs kyi dpung chen bskyed// 'di ltar las chen ltang sogs pa// gzhan du bskyed pa ma yin te/ rtse gcig don ldan rnal 'byor
370b3(1): pa// rgyud ldan snod ldan bya phyir dang // gal te rtsal zhan ma grub na// dge bsags ljang chen kun bsdoms te// las kyi bsags pa don bgrangs shing // gdung ba'i shugs phyung rtsal sprugs nas// nyi shar chu
370b4(1): klung zla brnyan ltar// rang bzhin shugs kyis 'grub par gces// de phyir phra mo yan chad kyang // bdag gi don du 'gyur bar bya// de ltar spyad pa spyod yi// phra mo'i rnal 'byor blo 'phel ba// chung ngu chung sogs
370b5(1): mthar zad nas// skong pa'i rnal 'byor 'khor lo yis// zhig dang ral dang chags 'dres dag/ bskang gso gzhug pa'i las 'di bya// las chen skong pa'i khyad par gyis// gnas su brtag par nges med de// mi
370b6(1): sdug skyon can bkra mi shis// spangs te med par gyur pa yi// shin tu sar pa'i gnas chen dag/ bskang pa'i gnas su de 'gyur ro// de ltar yid 'ong gnas btsal nas// drod ldan bla ma spyan drangs te// sri zhu
371a1(1): rgyal chos spyi bor bkur// de yang dmigs kyis zhu ba dag/ maN+Dal khar bsil tsam dag la// me long snying por ltar byas te// gtsang ma'i rgyu las rdzas byas pa// yid 'ong rnam lnga'i mchod pa
371a2(1): la// rkyen gyi rnal 'byor sna tshogs kyis// brgyan te bklubs pa'i sprin phung rnams// mnyes nas skong phyir rgyal la dbul// phyi 'khor skyong pa'i mgon po la// 'dod yon lnga la sogs pa yi// yid bzhin
371a3(1): longs spyod rkyen dang bcas// yon tan cha las smon bcol mchod// mnyes nas skongs pa'i stongs su 'gyur// khams gsum snying rje'i gnas rnams la// yo byad sbyin tshogs chen po las// 'dod pa'i bsam pa
371a4(1): rangs byas na// mgu bas skongs pa'i stongs su 'gyur/ bgegs su gyur pa'i gegs ris kyang // mnyam pa'i don gyis sems mi dbyung // dmigs kyis kha zas sna tshogs las// bgegs rnams mgu na thams
371a5(1): cad kyang // mnyam pa'i don gyis skongs pa'i rgyur// cung zad tsam du snang ba yin// de ltar skongs pa'i las rnams kyis// bskang bar bya ba'i dmigs rnams ni// rnam pa lngar ni snang ba ste// kun du nyams pa
371a6(1): chen po dang // rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams// de bzhin zlas nyams zhar nyams lnga// bskang ba'i thabs kyang lnga yod de// spyad pa'i las kyis bskang ba dang // rdzas dang don dang ting 'dzin dang // man ngag
371b1(1): gsang ba'i thabs chen no// de dag la yang lnga lnga ste// spyod pa'i tshul gyis bskang ba la// rnam par lnga ru bshad par bya// dang po 'bum lnga khri gsum ste// rtsa nyams khri lnga stong gsum mo// yan lag nyams par
371b2(1): gyur pa la// stong lnga brgya gsum thon par bya// bzlas nyams brgya lnga bcu gsum mo// zhar gyis nyams par gyur pa la// bcu lnga gcig gsum dag gis skongs// rdzas kyis bskang ba'i thams mchog ni// gal
371b3(1): te bsrung ba 'ga' zhig las// byang chub tsha thig ral gyur na/ gti mug rigs kyi tha tshig bskang // dmangs rigs bla ma spyan drangs la// nyes 'gal mi bcab stong du bshags// gser la sogs pa'i rdzas chen
371b4(1): gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// byang chub sems bskyed rgyud sbyang mnyan// rdo rje tha tshig ral gyur na// zhes sdang rigs kyi tha tshig bskang // rje'u rigs bla ma spyan drangs te// nyes byas mi bcab 'bum
371b5(1): du bshags// shel la sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// bsam gtan ting 'dzin bsgom brtson bya// rin chen tha tshig nyams gyur na/ nga rgyal rigs kyi tha tshig bskang // rgyal rigs
371b6(1): bla ma spyan drangs te// nyes byas mi bcab brgyad khrir bshags// bai DUr la sogs rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// sku gdung ring bsrel rnam par spel// pad+ma'i tha tshig ral gyur na// 'dod
372a1(1): chags rigs kyi tha tshig bskang // gdol rigs bla ma spyan drangs la// nyes byas mi bcab brgyar bshags bya// byi ru la sogs rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des bla// bshad bya zab
372a2(1): mo'i glegs bam brjod// las kyi tha tshig ral gyur na// phra dog rigs kyi tha tshig bskang // bram ze rigs bshes spyan drangs la// nyes byas mi bcab bcu lngar bshags// in+d+ra la sogs rdzas rnams kyis// tha
372a3(1): tshig gang brlag nor des blu// mchod sbyin bsod nams las chen bya// des ni bskang ba'i las chen 'grub// don gyis bskang ba'i thabs mchog kyang // rnam lnga'i tshul du bshad par bya// chos kun nam mkhar
372a4(1): bsgoms nas kyang // bag chags bzang ngan thams cad kun// ci yang med par blo la bzhag/ de la goms byas nyes pa med// kun la mkhas pa'i bla ma la// rgya che yangs pa'i chos mnyan te// bsam pa'i las
372a5(1): rnams rgya cher bya// yid kyis dmigs pa'i las dag na// rtsa ba nyams pa skong bar 'gyur// gal te yan lag nyams gyur na// chos nyid nam mkha'i don ston pa'i// glegs bam zab mo kun brtags te// don
372a6(1): rnams rgya cher brtag par bya// de ni yan lag nyams pa med// bzlas na tha tshig nyams gyur na// bla ma skyes bu mkhas pa la// gzhung chen tshugs pa'i bstan pa zhig/ ston pa'i yon bdag gnyer blangs te// blo
372b1(1): yi rtsal can kun bsdus te// dam chos bdud rtsi bstan par bsgrags// gal te zhar gyis nyams gyur na// bstan pa'i glegs bam rgya chen rnams// bris nas chos kyi sbyin par bya/ des ni zhar nyams skongs par
372b2(1): 'gyur// ting 'dzin rtsal gyi thabs mchog ni// bag chags can gyi spyi gtsug tu// rtsa dmar 'od ni me long tsam// shin tu 'bar zhing 'char gsal bas// chags dang bcas pa'i phung po bsregs// rnam grol
372b3(1): sems kyi rang bzhin dang // 'od kyi rang bzhin gcig pa las// dkar dang dmar dang mthing ga yi// 'od kyi thig le gsum du 'gyur// dkar por spros pas khyab pa che// dmar por spros pas chags pa
372b4(1): che// mthing ga thugs kyi sa bon te// rnam gsum gcig tu 'dus pa las// ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags bsregs// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig skongs// dkar po rlung zla'i dkyil 'khor la// dmar po
372b5(1): 'bud pa'i rlung byung bas// mtshan ma'i bag chags rnam par gtor// dmar po chu zla'i dkyil 'khor las// mthong ga ye shes chu byung bas// dngos po'i ldan ljin thams cad bkrus// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa
372b6(1): dang // rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// rdzas bsreg pa la me dgos kyang ma// bag chags tshig la me mi dgos// rig pa ye shes me byung bas// mtshan ma yi ni bud shing bsregs// 'jig rten gtor la
373a1(1): rlung dgos kyang // mtshan ma gtor la rlung mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes rlung byung bas// mtshan ma'i rdul tshogs rnam par 'phyag/ lus bkru ba la chu dgos kyang // sems bkru ba la chu mi
373a2(1): dgos// mnyam nyid chu bo khrus kyi rdzing // ye shes chu bo'i rgyun byung bas// bag chags ldan ljin thams cad bkrus// oM kro d+hi shwa ri sarba pA paM sho d+ha ya oM AHhUMHraM yaM khaM/ de skad tshig tu brjod pa yis// nyams
373a3(1): pa'i chad pa mi 'byung ngo // gcig tu bskang pa'i las chen yang // rigs kyi rdzas dang yo byad rnams// gnas su bsags nas byin brlabs te// phyi nang mtshams bcad brtan byas nas// so so rigs kyi
373a4(1): dam tshig la// 'gal bar gyur pa gang dang gang // mchod dang bshags dang gnod bkur te// yan lag brgyad kyi tshul bzung nas// bsam gtan gnas sbyangs rdzas bsab pa// gti mug rigs kyi dam tshig
373a5(1): la// shes nas rtogs par bya rgya las// ma rig log pa'i mthu yis na// tha tshig drag po yal gyu na// pho brang nam mkha'i ling+ga la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// a yi rang bzhin 'od gsal
373a6(1): bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na// phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa yis// 'od 'dril bskal pa'i mkha' gsal bas// gti mug ri bo'i mun bsal te// byang chub myu gu 'bar bar 'gyur// de ltar gsal
373b1(1): bar gyur pa dang // rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o bder gshegs tha tshig las// byang chub sems bde gsal 'bar ba// don du mi gtong gzhi bskyed de// sangs rgyas gdung chen rgyun snyam
373b2(1): las// ji ltar zla ba ra ri ltar// rgyu las byung ba'i rang bzhin las// byang chub myu gu nub ma khad// gzugs kyi phung po'i zhing khams su// bde mchog mkha' mnyam dbyings chen gsal// gnyen pos 'joms
373b3(1): pa'i thabs chen las// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// byang chub bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// skongs 'gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyar// sarba ta thA ga ta pu ta
373b4(1): sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // spyi bo brda'i tshul phyag rgya sbyar// zhe sdang rigs kyi tha tshig las// pho brang rnam shes ling+ga la// rdo rje bum pa'i dbus gnas par// hUM gi rang bzhin 'od gsal
373b5(1): 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na// phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa yis// 'od 'dril rdo rje'i phal lam gyis// zhes sdang ri bo brlags nas kyang // shes rab me long 'od gsal 'bar// de ltar gsal
373b6(1): bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o rdo rje tha tshig rnams// sems chen ye shes gsal 'bar ba// thugs mchog gdung chen rgyud snyam las// ji ltar ral gri so rgal ltar// de las
374a1(1): gyur pa'i rang bzhin las// shes rab me long nub ma khad// rnam shes phung po'i zhing khams su// gsal 'bar ye shes thig le 'phro// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen gyis// bskang ngo bskal
374a2(1): pa'i thugs dam bskang // gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// thugs mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang // oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas
374a3(1): kyang // snying gi brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// nga rgyal rigs kyi dam tshig las// snyoms nas dang du blang rgyu las// log pa'i nga rgyal de ma choms// tha tshig drag po yal 'gyur na// pho brang skye rgu'i ling+ga'i dkyil// rin
374a4(1): chen 'bar ba'i dbus gnas par// swa yi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na/ phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa las// 'od 'dril rin chen 'khor lo yis// nga rgyal de'u chen brlag
374a5(1): 'gyur nas// bsod nams ljon shing me tog 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma rin chen tha tshig las// bsod nams yon tan 'od 'bar ba// don du mi
374a6(1): gtong gzhi bskyed de// rgyu mchog gdung chen rgyud mnyam las// ji ltar mkha' la 'khrigs 'thibs ltar// rgyu las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// me tog 'od mdzes yal ma khad// tshor ba'i phung po'i zhing khams
374b1(1): su// che ba'i ye shes mnyam 'bar bas// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// sku mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang //
374b2(1): skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang // oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // 'phral ba brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// 'dod chags rigs kyi dam tshig las// rtogs nas spyad par bya rgu
374b3(1): las// 'dod log rgya mtsho ma ngoms te// tha tshig drag po yal 'gyur nas// pho brang pad+ma'i ling+ga'i dkyil// pad+mo 'bar ba'i dbus gnas par// oM gyi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par
374b4(1): gyur pa na// phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa las// 'od 'dril pad+ma'o mtshon cha las// 'dod chags rgya mtsho bskams gyur nas// pad+ma chos kyi ye shes 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis
374b5(1): tshig 'di brjod// e ma'i pad+mo'i tha tshig las// pad+ma'i ye shes 'od 'bar bas// don du mi gtong gzhi bskyed de// gsung mchog gdung chen rgyud mnyam nas// ji ltar pad stong tsher ma ltar// rgyu las gyur pa'i
374b6(1): rang bzhin gyis// pad+mo'i ye shes nub ma khad// 'du shes phung po'i zhing khams su// rtogs pa'i chos nyid 'od 'phros pas// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam
375a1(1): bskang // gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// gsung mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang // oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas
375a2(1): kyang // lce yi brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// phrag dog rig kyi dam tshig las// rtogs nas spyad par bya rgyu las// phrag dog log bzung dbang gis na// tha tshig drag po yal 'gyur ba// pho brang gsang ba'i ling+ga'i
375a3(1): dkyil// rdo rje ral gri dbus gnas par/ ha yi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na/ phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa las// 'od 'dril rdo rje'i ral gri yis// phrag dog mtshon
375a4(1): chags gsibs gyur nas/ rdo rje ral gri ye shes 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o phrin las tha tshig las// rdo rje ral gri 'od 'bar bas// don du mi
375a5(1): gtong gzhi bskyed de// phrin las gdung chen rgyud mnyam las// ji ltar nyi gsal sprin bsgribs ltar// rgyu las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rdo rje 'od chen nub ma khad// 'du bye phung po'i zhing khams su// ye shes
375a6(1): mtshon cha'i 'od 'phros pas// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// phrin las bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// skong gyur
375b1(1): bsam pa'i don du sbyang // oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // lus kyi brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// des kyang skong pa'i las chen 'grub// man ngag thabs kyi don mchog ni// rtsa ba
375b2(1): yan lag de rnams las// gang dag nyams par gyur pa la// man ngag thabs mchog lnga yis bskang // nyams pa chen por ltung 'gyur na// bla mar gyur pa'i skyes bu dag/ rgyal po dgu yi spyan lam du// sgrub pa
375b3(1): chen po dgu brtsam zhing // mchog chen dgu yi brtul zhugs spyad// rang gi gzungs ma gang yin pa// bla ma dgu la gzungs mar dbul// de bzhin rtsa ba yan lag dang // zla dang zhar las nyams pa la// sgrub pa
375b4(1): don gyi khyad par rnams// bdun nam lnga'am gsum mam gcig/ rim pa bzhin du sbyar byas na// des ni skongs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// bskang ba'i yul yang rnam lnga ste// bder gshegs rgyal ba mtha' dag
375b5(1): kyang // mdo ru bsdu na rnam lnga ste// gti mug zhes sdang nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags phrag dog 'di lnga dag/ rtsa bar gyur pa'i don gyis na// gzhi yang thams cad 'dis bsgyur bas// nyams dang ma nyams tha tshig
375b6(1): dang / longs spyod spong len thams cad rnams// 'di rgyu yin par rig bya ste// rgyu nyid rgyur btags dbang gis ni// bsgyur bas dug 'gyur sman chen ltar// de nyid tha tshig btsan por bsgyur// 'dul ba'i dbang
376a1(1): gi khyad par gyis// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+mo las lnga'i rigs su 'dus// de dag thugs dam mchog nyid kyang // rnam lngar 'dus par bstan pa la// rtogs nas bsrung bsgrub dam
376a2(1): bcas pa/ so so 'gal zhing chag nyams na// so so nyid du bsab par bya// sku yi chags nyams gnas su gzhug/ gsung gi 'gal 'khrul so ru bsab// thugs kyi 'gal 'khrul gsor med de// rdo rje snying
376a3(1): po'i tha tshig la// bskangs pas skongs par gyur pa yi// rtags chen dag kyang 'di lta ste// rgyal ba sangs rgyas rig 'dzin gyi// gdung chen dag las byung ba yi// sha ri ram zhes bya ba de// thams cad ltas su ston
376a4(1): par byed// shel gyi za ma tog nang du// dag par bcug ste btsas pa las// nyams pa'i chad pa 'byung ba'i tshe// kha dog gnag cing 'bros par 'gyur// nyams pa skongs sam sor chud cing // gal te dam tshig ma
